As Neville gives a defiant response and draws the sword from the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sorting_Hat"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sorting Hat}}, Harry reveals he is still alive; the Malfoys and many\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eaters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Death Eaters}}\'a0abandon Voldemort. While Harry confronts Voldemort in a duel throughout the castle,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Molly_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Molly Weasley}}\'a0kills Bellatrix in the Great Hall and Neville decapitates Nagini, making Voldemort mortal. Harry and Voldemort's fight ends with Voldemort's own Killing Curse rebounding and obliterating him. After the battle, Harry explains to Ron and Hermione that the Elder Wand recognised him as its true master after he disarmed Draco, who had earlier disarmed its previous owner, Dumbledore. Harry destroys the Elder Wand rather than claim it.\
Nineteen years later, Harry,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ginny_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ginny Weasley}}, Ron, Hermione, and Draco proudly watch their own children leave for Hogwarts at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/London_King%27s_Cross_railway_station"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 King's Cross station}}.\
Following the battle of Starkiller Base, General\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Leia_Organa"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Leia Organa}}\'a0leads\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Resistance_(Star_Wars)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Resistance}}\'a0forces to flee D'Qar when a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/First_Order_(Star_Wars)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 First Order}}\'a0fleet arrives.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Poe_Dameron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Poe Dameron}}\'a0leads a costly counterattack that destroys a First Order dreadnought, but after the Resistance escapes to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hyperspace_(science_fiction)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hyperspace}}, the First Order tracks them and attacks the Resistance convoy.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kylo_Ren"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Kylo Ren}}, Leia's son, hesitates to fire on the lead Resistance ship after sensing his mother's presence, but his wingmen destroy the bridge, killing most of the Resistance leadership and incapacitating Leia, who survives by using the Force. Disapproving of new leader\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Vice_Admiral_Holdo"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Vice Admiral Holdo}}'s passive strategy, Poe helps\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Finn_(Star_Wars)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Finn}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/BB-8"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 BB-8}}, and mechanic\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rose_Tico"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rose Tico}}\'a0embark on a secret mission to disable the First Order's tracking device.\
Meanwhile,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rey_(Star_Wars)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rey}}\'a0arrives on\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ahch-To"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ahch-To}}\'a0with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chewbacca"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Chewbacca}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/R2-D2"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 R2-D2}}\'a0aboard the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Millennium_Falcon"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Millennium Falcon}}\'a0to recruit\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Luke_Skywalker"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Luke Skywalker}}\'a0to the Resistance. Disillusioned by his failure to train Kylo as a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Jedi"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Jedi}}, and under self-imposed exile from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Force"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 the Force}}, Luke refuses to help \'96 even after he learns of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Han_Solo"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Han Solo}}'s death at Kylo's hands \'96 and believes the Jedi should go extinct. Unbeknownst to Luke, Rey and Kylo communicate through the Force, puzzling the two enemies. As Rey and Kylo learn about each other, both have visions of themselves as future partners.\
R2-D2 persuades Luke to train Rey. After Kylo tells Rey what happened between him and Luke that caused him to choose the dark side, Luke confesses that he momentarily contemplated killing Kylo upon sensing that\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Supreme_Leader_Snoke"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Supreme Leader Snoke}}\'a0was corrupting him, causing Kylo to destroy Luke's new Jedi Order in retaliation. Convinced that Kylo can be redeemed, Rey leaves Ahch-To without Luke. Luke prepares to burn the Ahch-To Jedi temple and library, but hesitates.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Yoda"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Yoda}}'s ghost appears and destroys the temple by summoning a bolt of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lightning"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 lightning}}, claiming Rey has all she needs to learn, and encourages Luke to learn from his failure.\
Holdo reveals her plan to discreetly evacuate the remaining Resistance members using small transports. Believing her actions cowardly and risky, Poe leads a mutiny. Finn, Rose, and BB-8 travel to the Canto Bight casino and acquire the help of the hacker\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/DJ_(Star_Wars)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 DJ}}. They infiltrate Snoke's ship, where all but BB-8 are captured by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Captain_Phasma"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Captain Phasma}}. Meanwhile, Rey lands on the ship, and Kylo brings her to Snoke, who says he facilitated the mental connection between her and Kylo as part of a plan to destroy Luke. Ordered to kill Rey, Kylo instead kills Snoke and defeats Snoke's guards alongside Rey. Rey believes that Kylo has returned to the light side of the Force, but he instead invites her to rule the galaxy with him. Refusing, she fights Kylo for possession of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Darth_Vader"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Anakin Skywalker}}'s lightsaber, which splits in two.\
Leia recovers and stuns Poe, allowing the evacuation to begin. Holdo remains on the ship to mislead Snoke's fleet as the others flee to an abandoned\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rebel_Alliance"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rebel Alliance}}\'a0base on\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Crait"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Crait}}. DJ reveals the Resistance's plan to the First Order, and the evacuation transports are slowly destroyed. Holdo sacrifices herself by ramming Snoke's fleet at lightspeed; Rey escapes in the chaos, while Kylo declares himself Supreme Leader. BB-8 frees Finn and Rose, who escape after defeating Phasma, and join the survivors on Crait. When the First Order arrives, Poe, Finn, and Rose attack with old speeders. Rey and Chewbacca draw the TIE fighters away with the\'a0
\f1\i Falcon
\f0\i0 , while Rose stops Finn from completing a suicide run against the enemy siege cannon, which subsequently penetrates the Resistance fortress.\
Luke appears and confronts the First Order to enable surviving Resistance members to escape. Kylo orders the First Order's forces to fire on Luke, to no effect. He then engages Luke in a lightsaber duel; upon striking Luke, Kylo realizes he has been fighting a Force projection of him. Rey uses the Force to help the Resistance escape on the\'a0
\f1\i Falcon
\f0\i0 . Luke, exhausted, becomes one with the Force and dies peacefully on Ahch-To. Rey and Leia sense his death, and Leia tells surviving rebels that the Resistance has all it needs to rise again. At Canto Bight, one of the children who helped Finn and Rose escape grabs a broom with the Force and gazes into space.\
A small team of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mercenary"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 mercenaries}}\'a0arrives on the abandoned\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Isla_Nublar"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Isla Nublar}}\'a0to collect\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/DNA"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 DNA}}\'a0from the remains of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_cloned_animals_in_the_Jurassic_Park_series#Indominus_rex"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Indominus rex}}\'a0at the bottom of the park's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lagoon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 lagoon}}. After successfully collecting a bone fragment, the team's survivors barely escape the island following attacks by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mosasaurus"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mosasaurus}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tyrannosaurus"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tyrannosaurus rex}}.
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [8][9]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \
A\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Senate"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 U.S. Senate}}\'a0hearing in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Washington,_D.C."}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Washington, D.C.}}\'a0debates whether Isla Nublar's dinosaurs should be saved from an impending volcanic eruption. Mathematician\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Dr._Ian_Malcolm"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dr. Ian Malcolm}}\'a0testifies that the dinosaurs should be allowed to perish to correct\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#John_Hammond"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 John Hammond}}'s mistake of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cloning"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cloning}}\'a0them. Meanwhile, Jurassic World's former operations manager, Claire Dearing, has established the Dinosaur Protection Group to save the animals. After the Senate rules against rescuing the dinosaurs, Hammond's former partner,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Sir_Benjamin_Lockwood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Benjamin Lockwood}}, summons Claire to his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Northern_California"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Northern California}}\'a0estate. Lockwood and his aide,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Eli_Mills"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Eli Mills}}, reveal a plan to relocate the dinosaurs to a new island sanctuary. Claire is needed to help reactivate the park's dinosaur\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/GPS_wildlife_tracking"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 tracking system}}\'a0to locate the animals, particularly Blue, the last surviving\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Velociraptor"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Velociraptor}}. Although they are estranged, Claire recruits Jurassic World's former\'a0
\f1\i Velociraptor
\f0\i0 \'a0trainer and Blue's alpha, Owen Grady, to help capture her.\
On Isla Nublar, Claire and former park technician\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Franklin_Webb"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Franklin Webb}}\'a0reactivate the online\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/GPS_wildlife_tracking"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 tracking system}}. Owen, paleo-veterinarian\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Dr._Zia_Rodriguez"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Zia Rodriguez}}, and a mercenary team led by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Ken_Wheatley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ken Wheatley}}\'a0search for and find Blue. The encounter escalates, resulting in a mercenary soldier shooting Blue, and Wheatley\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sedative"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 tranquilizing}}\'a0Owen. The mercenaries take Zia with them to treat Blue's injury. The mercenary ship, loaded with the captured dinosaurs, departs for the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Contiguous_United_States"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 U.S. mainland}}\'a0as the dinosaurs left behind die in the eruption. Claire, Franklin, and Owen sneak aboard in time and assist Zia in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Blood_transfusion"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 transfusing}}\'a0Blue with\'a0
\f1\i Tyrannosaurus
\f0\i0 \'a0blood. The group now realize that the captured dinosaurs were never being transported to a new island and are for another purpose.\
At the estate, Lockwood's orphaned pre-teen granddaughter\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Maisie_Lockwood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Maisie}}\'a0overhears Mills and auctioneer\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Gunnar_Eversol"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gunnar Eversol}}\'a0secretly planning to auction the captured dinosaurs on the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Black_market"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 black market}}. They will also unveil the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_cloned_animals_in_the_Jurassic_Park_series#Indoraptor"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Indoraptor}}, a new\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Genetic_engineering"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 genetically-modified}}\'a0dinosaur created by geneticist\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Jurassic_Park_characters#Dr._Henry_Wu"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dr. Henry Wu}}\'a0using\'a0
\f1\i Indominus rex
\f0\i0 \'a0and\'a0
\f1\i Velociraptor
\f0\i0 \'a0DNA. Wu wants Blue's DNA to create an enhanced\'a0
\f1\i Indoraptor
\f0\i0 , unaware that Blue's blood is contaminated. After Maisie informs Lockwood about the auction, he confronts Mills, who murders him. Maisie is later revealed to have been cloned from Lockwood's deceased daughter and is the reason John Hammond, who opposed\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Human_cloning"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 human cloning}}, ended their association.\
The dinosaurs are transported to Lockwood's estate and caged. Zia and Franklin narrowly evade capture, but Owen and Claire are apprehended and confined. Owen incites a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Stygimoloch"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Stygimoloch}}\'a0into breaking open their cell. They find Maisie, who leads them to the auction where the\'a0
\f1\i Indoraptor
\f0\i0 \'a0is being sold despite Wu's protests that it is a prototype. Owen disrupts the proceedings by luring the\'a0
\f1\i Stygimoloch
\f0\i0 \'a0into the room. In the ensuing chaos, Wheatley tranquilizes the\'a0
\f1\i Indoraptor
\f0\i0 \'a0to extract a tooth as a trophy, but it feigns sedation and kills Wheatley, Eversol, and others as it escapes. The\'a0
\f1\i Indoraptor
\f0\i0 \'a0hunts Owen, Claire, and Maisie throughout the mansion. Zia releases Blue, who attacks the\'a0
\f1\i Indoraptor
\f0\i0 , causing it to fall through a glass roof to its death.\
When a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hydrogen_cyanide"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hydrogen cyanide}}\'a0gas leak threatens the caged dinosaurs, Maisie frees them, despite Owen's objections. Mills attempts to flee with the\'a0
\f1\i Indominus rex
\f0\i0 \'a0bone but is devoured by the\'a0
\f1\i Tyrannosaurus
\f0\i0 , which tramples the bone. Owen, Claire, Maisie, Zia, and Franklin safely escape, while Blue and the other released dinosaurs flee the estate grounds.\
In a new U.S. Senate hearing, Dr. Malcolm declares the beginning of a Neo-Jurassic Age, where humans and dinosaurs must learn to coexist. The closing scenes show the freed dinosaurs roaming wilderness and outer urban areas.\
Princess\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Elsa_(Frozen)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Elsa}}\'a0of Arendelle possesses paranormal powers that allows her to control and create ice and snow, often using it to play with her younger sister,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Anna_(Frozen)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Anna}}. After Elsa accidentally injures Anna with her magic, their parents, the King and Queen, take both siblings to a colony of trolls led by Grand Pabbie. He heals Anna, but alters her memories to remove traces of Elsa's magic, warning Elsa that she must learn to control her powers. The King and Queen isolate both sisters within the castle. Elsa shuts Anna out, causing a rift between them. Unable to control it, Elsa can only suppress her power, causing her to become more insecure. When the sisters are teenagers, their parents die at sea during a storm.\
When Elsa turns 21, she is to be crowned queen of Arendelle. She is terrified that the kingdom's citizens might find out about her powers and fear her. The castle gates open to the public and visiting dignitaries for the first time in years. Among them is the scheming Duke of Weselton and the dashing\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hans_(Frozen)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Prince Hans}}\'a0of the Southern Isles, the latter of whom Anna falls in love with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Love_at_first_sight"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 at first sight}}. Elsa's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Coronation"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 coronation}}\'a0happens without a hitch, but she still remains distant from Anna. When Hans proposes to Anna, Elsa objects, accidentally unleashing her powers before the court; the Duke brands her a monster. Elsa flees to the North Mountain, where she builds a palace of ice in which to live a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hermit"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hermit}}\'a0life. In the process, however, her suppressed magic engulfs Arendelle in an eternal winter.\
Anna ventures out to find Elsa and end the winter, leaving Hans in command. She gets lost, collecting supplies at Wandering Oaken's shop. She meets an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Iceman_(occupation)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 ice harvester}}\'a0named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kristoff_(Frozen)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Kristoff}}\'a0and his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Reindeer"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 reindeer}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sven_(Frozen)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sven}}, convincing them to take her to the mountains. An attack by wolves leads to Kristoff's sleigh being destroyed. On foot, they meet\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Olaf_(Frozen)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Olaf}}, a cheerful\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Snowman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 snowman}}\'a0brought to life unknowingly by Elsa, who offers to lead them to her. When Anna's horse returns to Arendelle, Hans sets out to find Anna and Elsa, accompanied by the Duke's minions, who have secret orders to kill Elsa.\
Reaching the ice palace, Anna meets Elsa, but when she reveals what has become of Arendelle, Elsa becomes upset, saying that she cannot undo it, and accidentally freezes Anna's heart. She then makes a giant snow monster named Marshmallow, who chases Anna, Kristoff, and Olaf away. Anna's hair begins turning white, so Kristoff takes her to meet the trolls, his adoptive family. Grand Pabbie reveals that Anna will freeze solid unless "an act of true love" reverses the spell. Kristoff races Anna back home so Hans can give her true love's kiss. Hans and his men reach Elsa's palace, defeating Marshmallow and capturing Elsa. Anna is delivered to Hans but, rather than kissing her, Hans instead reveals that he has actually been plotting to seize the throne of Arendelle by eliminating both sisters. Hans locks Anna in a room to die, and then manipulates the dignitaries into believing that Elsa killed her. He orders the queen's execution, only to discover she has escaped her detention cell.\
Olaf frees Anna, and they venture into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Blizzard"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 blizzard}}\'a0outside to meet Kristoff, whom Olaf reveals is in love with her. Hans confronts Elsa outside, claiming that she killed Anna, causing Elsa to break down. Anna spots Hans about to kill Elsa; she leaps in the way and freezes solid, stopping Hans. Devastated, Elsa hugs and mourns over her sister, who\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Thaw_(weather)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 thaws}}\'a0out, her heroism constituting "an act of true love". Realizing that love is the key to controlling her magic, Elsa ends the winter and gives Olaf his own snow flurry to survive the warmer climate. Both Hans and the Duke are arrested and exiled from the kingdom. Anna gives Kristoff a new sleigh, and the two kiss. Both sisters are reunited and Elsa promises never to lock the castle gates again.\
A beautiful enchantress disguised as an old beggar woman arrives at a French castle during a ball and offers the host, a cruel and selfish prince, a rose in return for shelter from a storm. When he refuses, she reveals her identity. To punish the prince for his lack of compassion, the enchantress transforms him into a beast and his servants into household objects, then erases the castle, the prince and his servants from the memories of their loved ones (in the small town of Villeneuve nearby). She casts a spell on the rose and warns the prince that if he learns to love another, and earn their love in return before the last petal falls, then the spell will be broken. If not, he will remain a beast forever.\
Some years later, at Villeneuve, Belle, the book-loving daughter of a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Music_box"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 music box}}\'a0maker and artist, Maurice, dreams of adventure and brushes off advances from Gaston, an arrogant former soldier. On his way to a convention and lost in the forest, Maurice seeks refuge in the Beast's castle warming himself near the fire then being scared away by Chip after having some food, but the Beast imprisons him for stealing a rose from his garden as a gift to Belle. When Maurice's horse returns without him, Belle ventures out in search for him, and finds him locked in the castle dungeon. The Beast agrees to let her take Maurice's place.\
Belle befriends the castle's servants, who invite her to a spectacular dinner. When she wanders into the forbidden west wing and finds the rose, the Beast scares her into the woods. She is ambushed by a pack of wolves, but the Beast rescues her, and is injured in the process. As Belle nurses his wounds, a friendship develops between them, also he shows her his library and gives it to her which makes her feel a different way towards the Beast unlike before. The Beast shows Belle a gift from the enchantress, a book that transports readers wherever they want. Belle uses the book to visit her childhood home in Paris, where she discovers a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Plague_doctor_costume"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 plague doctor mask}}\'a0and realizes that she and her father were forced to leave when her mother succumbed to the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bubonic_plague"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 plague}}.\
In Villeneuve, Maurice tries to convince the other villagers of the Beast and Belle's imprisonment but no one believes him. Gaston, seeing rescuing Belle as an opportunity to win her hand in marriage, agrees to help Maurice. When Maurice learns of his ulterior motive and rejects him, Gaston abandons him to be eaten by the wolves. Maurice is rescued by the hermit Agathe, but when he tells the townsfolk of Gaston's crime and is unable to provide solid evidence, Gaston convinces them to send Maurice to an insane asylum.\
After sharing a romantic dance with the Beast, Belle discovers her father's predicament using a magic mirror. The Beast places Belle's happiness before his own releases her to save Maurice, giving her the mirror to remember him with leaving him and his servants heartbroken. At Villeneuve, Belle reveals the Beast in the mirror to the townsfolk, proving her father's sanity. Realizing that Belle loves the Beast, a jealous Gaston claims she has been charmed by dark magic, and has her thrown into the asylum carriage with her father. He rallies the villagers to follow him to the castle to slay the Beast before he curses the whole village. Maurice and Belle escape, and Belle rushes back to the castle.\
During the battle, Gaston abandons his companion LeFou, who then sides with the servants to fend off the villagers. Gaston attacks the Beast in his tower, who is too heartbroken from Belle's departure to fight back, but regains his spirit upon seeing Belle return. He defeats Gaston, but spares his life before reuniting with Belle. Ungrateful and unrepentant, Gaston mortally wounds the Beast with a gunshot from a bridge, but it collapses when the castle crumbles, and he falls to his death. The injured Beast tells Belle that he was happy to see her again then he dies in her arms as the last petal falls, and the servants become inanimate. Belle tearfully professes her love to the Beast, Agathe reveals herself as the enchantress and undoes the curse, repairing the crumbling castle, and reviving the Beast then turning him and his servants' human making the villagers' remember their loved ones. The Prince and Belle host a ball for the villagers, where they dance happily.\
The\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#The_Parr_Family"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Incredibles}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Frozone"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Frozone}}\'a0battle the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#The_Underminer"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Underminer}}, who has just appeared to terrorize Metroville. Though they prevent the destruction of City Hall, they are unable to stop him from robbing a bank and escaping. The collateral damage caused by the incident outrages the government and prompts them to shut down the Superhero Relocation Program, leaving the Parrs without financial assistance.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Violet_Parr"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Violet}}'s love interest\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Tony_Rydinger"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tony Rydinger}}\'a0also discovers her superhero identity, forcing agent\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Rick_Dicker"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rick Dicker}}\'a0to erase his memory. Lucius informs\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Bob_Parr_(Mr._Incredible)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mr. Incredible}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Helen_Parr_(Pixar_character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Elastigirl}}\'a0of an offer from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Winston_Deavor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Winston Deavor}}, a wealthy businessman. He and his sister\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Evelyn_Deavor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Evelyn}}\'a0propose sending the heroes on secret missions which will be recorded and publicized to regain public trust in superheroes.\
Due to Mr. Incredible's tendency to accidentally cause collateral damage, Winston chooses Elastigirl for the initial missions. While Elastigirl is away, Bob struggles with his new role as a stay-at-home parent:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dash_Parr"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dash}}\'a0has trouble with math homework, Violet becomes withdrawn after Tony unintentionally fails to show up at their date due to his memory wipe, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#Jack-Jack_Parr"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Jack-Jack}}\'a0wreaks havoc with his burgeoning superpowers. Bob brings Jack-Jack to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Edna_Mode"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Edna Mode}}, who develops a suit that controls his abilities, allowing Bob to relax from his parenting difficulties. Meanwhile, on her missions, Elastigirl encounters a mysterious supervillain called the Screenslaver, who projects\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hypnosis"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hypnotic}}\'a0images using television screens. She tracks him down to his hideout in an apartment building, and unmasks him as a deliveryman with no recollection of his actions.\
At a party celebrating the Screenslaver's arrest, Winston announces a summit of world leaders to legalize superheroes, hosted aboard his luxury yacht. Unsettled by the ease with which she captured the Screenslaver, Elastigirl realizes that he was controlled by a pair of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mind_control"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 mind-control}}\'a0goggles. Evelyn forces the goggles onto Elastigirl, revealing herself as the mastermind behind the Screenslaver. Evelyn explains that she has hated superheroes since\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Incredibles_characters#List_of_known_superheroes"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gazerbeam and Fironic}}\'a0failed to rescue her father from being killed by burglars, concluding that superheroes have taken independence from society. She plans to sabotage her brother's summit and cause a catastrophe that will tarnish the reputation of superheroes, ensuring they remain outlawed forever. Using Helen, she lures Bob into a trap, then sends another group of hypnotised superheroes previously invited to the summit to subdue the Parr children. Lucius tries to protect them, but is overwhelmed and placed under Evelyn's control.\
Violet, Dash, and Jack-Jack escape with the help of the Incredibile, a high-tech car once owned by Bob during his time as Mr. Incredible, and reach Winston's ship. On board, the hypnotized Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl, and Frozone recite a vindictive manifesto on air to paint superheroes as a threat. They subdue the ship crew, aim the ship at Municiberg, and destroy the controls. The Incredible children reach them, upon which Jack-Jack removes Elastigirl's goggles, and she frees Mr. Incredible and Frozone. The Parrs and Lucius release the other mind-controlled superheroes by destroying their goggles, then work together to prevent the ship from crashing into the city by turning the rudders to the side. Evelyn attempts to escape in a jet, but is apprehended by Elastigirl and arrested. Due to their actions, superheroes around the world regain legal status.\
Later, Tony, after getting reconnected to Violet, accompanies her to a movie with the family. When the Parrs spot a high-speed pursuit between\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Police"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 police}}\'a0and gunmen, Violet leaves Tony at the theater, and the Incredibles give chase in a red Incredibile.\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dominic_Toretto"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dominic "Dom" Toretto}}\'a0and Letty Ortiz are on their honeymoon in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Havana"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Havana}}\'a0when Dom's cousin Fernando gets in trouble owing money to local racer Raldo. Sensing Raldo is a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Loan_shark"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 loan shark}}, Dom challenges Raldo to a race, pitting Fernando's reworked car against Raldo's, and wagering his own\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Show_car"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 show car}}. After narrowly winning the race, Dom allows Raldo to keep his car, earning his respect, and instead leaves his cousin with his show car.\
The next day, Dom is approached by the elusive\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cyberterrorism"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cyberterrorist}}\'a0Cipher who coerces him into working for her. Shortly afterwards, Dom and his team, comprising Letty, Roman Pearce, Tej Parker, and Ramsey, are recruited by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Diplomatic_Security_Service"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Diplomatic Security Service}}\'a0(DSS) agent Luke Hobbs to help him retrieve an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Electromagnetic_pulse"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 EMP device}}\'a0from a military outpost in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Berlin"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Berlin}}. During the getaway, Dom goes rogue, forcing Hobbs off the road and stealing the device for Cipher. Hobbs is arrested and locked up in the same high-security prison he helped imprison Deckard Shaw in. After escaping, Deckard and Hobbs are recruited by intelligence operative\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Fast_and_the_Furious_characters#Mr._Nobody"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mr. Nobody}}\'a0and his prot\'e9g\'e9 to help the team find Dom and capture Cipher. Deckard reveals that Cipher had hired his brother Owen Shaw to steal the Nightshade device and Mose Jakande to steal God's Eye, Ramsey's software program. The team tracks Dom and Cipher to their very location just as the latter two attack the base and steal God's Eye. When Dom questions Cipher's motives, she reveals that she has been holding hostage Dom's ex-lover and DSS agent Elena Neves\'97as well as their son, of whose existence Dom was previously unaware. Elena tells Dom that she wanted him to decide the child's first name, having already given him the middle name Marcos.\
In\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_York_City"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New York City}}, Cipher sends Dom to retrieve a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nuclear_football"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 nuclear football}}\'a0held by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ministry_of_Defence_(Russia)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Russian Minister of Defence}}. Prior to the theft, Dom briefly evades Cipher\'97with the help of Raldo\'97and persuades Deckard and Owen's mother, Magdalene Shaw, to help him. Cipher hacks into the electronics systems of a large number of cars, causing them to drive automatically and taking out the convoy so that Dom can take the football. The team intercepts Dom, but Dom escapes, shooting and apparently killing Deckard in the process. Letty catches up to Dom, but is ambushed and nearly killed by Cipher's enforcer, Connor Rhodes, before Dom rescues her. In retaliation, Cipher has Rhodes execute Elena in front of Dom.\
Dom infiltrates a base in Russia to use the EMP device to disable their security and then to disable a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nuclear_submarine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 nuclear submarine}}, enabling Cipher to hijack it and attempt to use its arsenal to trigger a nuclear war. They are once again intercepted by the team, who attempt to shut down the sub, and then drive out toward the gates that would prevent the sub from leaving into open waters. Meanwhile, Deckard, whose death was apparently faked, teams up with Owen, and at Magdalene's behest, infiltrates Cipher's plane to rescue Dom's son. Once Deckard reports that the child is safe, Dom turns on Cipher and kills Rhodes, avenging Elena's death, before rejoining his team. Outraged, Cipher fires an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Infrared_homing"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 infrared homing}}\'a0missile at Dom, but he breaks away from his team and maneuvers around it, causing the missile to hit the submarine instead. The team quickly forms a vehicular blockade around Dom, shielding him from the ensuing explosion. Deckard reaches the front of the plane and confronts Cipher, who jumps from the plane with a parachute.\
Mr. Nobody and his prot\'e9g\'e9 visit Dom and his team in New York City to report that Cipher is still at large in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Athens"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Athens}}. Hobbs is offered his DSS job back, but he declines in order to spend more time with his daughter. Deckard delivers Dom his son, putting his differences aside with Dom and Hobbs. Dom names his son Brian, after his friend and brother-in-law\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Brian_O%27Conner"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Brian O'Conner}}, and they celebrate.\
At a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_Year%27s_Eve"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New Year's Eve}}\'a0party in 1999,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tony_Stark_(Marvel_Cinematic_Universe)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tony Stark}}\'a0meets scientist\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Maya_Hansen"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Maya Hansen}}, the inventor of an experimental regenerative treatment named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Extremis"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Extremis}}\'a0that allows recovery from crippling injuries. Disabled scientist\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aldrich_Killian"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Aldrich Killian}}\'a0offers them a place in his company\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Advanced_Idea_Mechanics"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Advanced Idea Mechanics}}, but Stark rejects him. In 2013, Stark is having panic attacks due to his experiences during the alien invasion and subsequent Battle of New York.
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 2
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 Restless, he has built dozens of new\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Iron_Man%27s_armor_in_other_media#Live_action"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Iron Man suits}}, creating friction with his girlfriend\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pepper_Potts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Pepper Potts}}.\
A string of bombings claimed by a terrorist known as the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mandarin_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mandarin}}\'a0has left intelligence agencies bewildered by a lack of forensic evidence. Stark's security chief\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Happy_Hogan_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Happy Hogan}}\'a0is badly injured in one such attack, prompting Stark to brazenly issue a televised threat to the Mandarin. The Mandarin sends gunship helicopters to destroy Stark's home. Hansen, who came to warn Stark, survives the attack with Potts. Stark escapes in an experimental new Iron Man suit, which his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Artificial_intelligence"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 artificial intelligence}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Edwin_Jarvis"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 J.A.R.V.I.S.}}\'a0pilots to rural Tennessee, following a flight plan from Stark's investigation into the Mandarin. Stark's new armor is not fully functional, and lacks sufficient power to return to California, leaving the world to believe him dead.\
Teaming with Harley, a 10-year-old boy, Stark investigates the remains of a local explosion bearing the hallmarks of a Mandarin attack. He discovers the "bombings" were triggered by soldiers subjected to Extremis whose bodies explosively rejected the treatment. These explosions were falsely attributed to a terrorist plot in order to cover up Extremis's flaws. Stark witnesses Extremis firsthand when Mandarin agents\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ellen_Brandt"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Brandt}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Coldblood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Savin}}\'a0attack him. Meanwhile, Killian resurfaces and kidnaps Potts and Hansen. American intelligence agencies continue to search for the Mandarin's location, with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/War_Machine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 James Rhodes}}\'97the former War Machine, now re-branded as the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Iron_Patriot"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Iron Patriot}}\'97lured into a trap to steal his Iron Man-like armor.\
With Harley's help, Stark traces the Mandarin to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Miami"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Miami}}\'a0and infiltrates his headquarters using improvised weapons. Inside he discovers the Mandarin is actually an English actor named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Trevor_Slattery"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Trevor Slattery}}, who is oblivious to the actions carried out in his image. Killian, who appropriated Hansen's Extremis research as a cure for his own disability and expanded the program to include injured war veterans, reveals he is the real Mandarin behind Slattery's cover. After capturing Stark, Killian reveals that he has subjected Potts to Extremis in the hope that Stark will help fix Extremis's flaws while trying to save her. Killian kills Hansen when she tries to stop him.\
Stark escapes and reunites with Rhodes, discovering that Killian intends to attack President Ellis aboard\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Air_Force_One"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Air Force One}}, using the Iron Patriot armor. Stark saves some surviving passengers and crew but cannot stop Killian from abducting Ellis and destroying Air Force One. They trace Killian to an impounded damaged oil tanker where Killian intends to kill Ellis on live television. The Vice President will become a puppet leader, following Killian's orders in exchange for Extremis to cure his young daughter's disability. On the platform, Stark works to save Potts, as Rhodes goes after the President. Stark summons his remaining Iron Man suits, controlled remotely by J.A.R.V.I.S., to provide air support. Rhodes secures the President and takes him to safety, while Stark discovers Potts has survived the Extremis procedure; before he can save her, a rig collapses around them and she falls to her apparent death. Stark confronts Killian and traps him in an Iron Man suit that he self-destructs, but fails to kill him. Potts, whose Extremis powers allowed her to survive her fall, intervenes and kills Killian.\
Stark orders J.A.R.V.I.S. to remotely destroy each Iron Man suit as a sign of his devotion to Potts, while the Vice President and Slattery are arrested. With Stark's help, Potts' Extremis effects are stabilized, and Stark promises to scale back his life as Iron Man, undergoing surgery to remove the shrapnel near his heart and throwing his obsolete chest arc reactor into the sea. He muses that, even without the technology, he will always be Iron Man.\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minions_(Despicable_Me)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Minions}}\'a0are small, yellow creatures who have existed since the beginning of time, evolving from yellow\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Unicellular_organism"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 single-celled organisms}}\'a0into beings which exist only to serve history's most despicable masters.
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [14]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \'a0After rolling a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tyrannosaurus"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tyrannosaurus}}\'a0into a volcano, getting their\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Caveman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 caveman}}\'a0leader eaten by a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cave_bear"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cave bear}}, crushing a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pharaoh"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Pharaoh}}\'a0under the pyramids for incorrect construction, burning\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Count_Dracula"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Count Dracula}}\'a0on his birthday party, and accidentally firing a cannon at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Napoleon_Bonaparte"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Napoleon}}, the Minions are driven into isolation and start a new life in a massive cave. After many years, the Minions become depressed, restless, and unmotivated without a master to serve. To regain their dignity and sense of purpose, Kevin, one fearless Minion, decides to set out to find a new master and asks for help. Stuart, a musically inclined, one-eyed Minion, and Bob, a young and inexperienced but enthusiastic Minion, are recruited.\
The trio journey to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_York_City"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New York}}, when the year is 1968. After spending the day attempting to blend in, the Minions end up in a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Department_store"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 department store}}\'a0for the night, where they discover a hidden commercial broadcast for villains advertising Villain-Con; a convention for villains and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Supervillains"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 supervillains}}\'a0in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Orlando"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Orlando}}. The trio\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hitchhike"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hitchhikes}}\'a0a ride with the Nelson family and impress them with their accidental villainy. At the convention, they see Scarlet Overkill, the first female supervillain, who unexpectedly hires them and takes them to her home in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/England"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 England}}. They phone the rest of the Minions to get them to join.\
Scarlet explains the plan to steal the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Imperial_State_Crown"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Imperial State Crown}}\'a0from the Queen of England and promises to reward the Minions if they steal it but kill them if they do not. Her husband, Herb, supplies them with inventions to aid in the heist, but they are nearly caught when they break into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tower_of_London"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tower of London}}, which leads to a chase that ends with Bob accidentally crashing into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/King_Arthur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sword in the Stone}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Excalibur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 pulling it free}}, removing the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Queen_regnant"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Queen}}\'a0from the throne and becoming King Bob. Enraged that somebody else accomplishes her dream of stealing the throne, Scarlet confronts the Minions, so Bob abdicates the throne in her favor. Undeterred because she feels betrayed, Scarlet imprisons the three in a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dungeon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 dungeon}}\'a0to be tortured by Herb before her\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Coronation"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 coronation}}, but they escape with the intention to apologize to Scarlet.\
After making their way to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Westminster_Abbey"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Westminster Abbey}}, Stuart and Bob interrupt the coronation by inadvertently dropping a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chandelier"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 chandelier}}\'a0on Scarlet, who orders their execution. Dozens of villains chase the three of them during a thunderstorm; Stuart and Bob are caught, while Kevin finds his way into a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pub"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 pub}}. He sees Scarlet on a television, promising that she will kill Stuart and Bob if Kevin does not show up by dawn. With the villains still searching for him, Kevin sneaks into Scarlet's castle to steal weapons. But right before the villains catch him, Kevin accidentally triggers a machine Herb was building and grows until he is thirty stories tall, destroying the castle. He tramples through London, rescuing his friends and battling Scarlet just as the other Minions turn up in London. Scarlet tries to eradicate them, but Kevin swallows a massive missile she fires at them. Scarlet and Herb attempt to escape with her rocket-dress, but Kevin holds onto it. The missile detonates, causing it to explode. The other Minions stare at the explosion in sadness but Kevin turns out to have survived and shrunk back to his normal size.\
Queen Elizabeth II gets her throne and crown back and rewards Bob with a tiny crown for his teddy bear, Stuart with an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Electric_guitar"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 electric guitar}}\'a0and Kevin with a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Knighthood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 knighthood}}. Scarlet and Herb, who turn out to have also survived the explosion, steal the crown once more only to be frozen in place by a young\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Despicable_Me_(franchise)#Main_characters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gru}}, who flees with the crown on a rocket-powered motorbike. The Minions stare in awe and run after him,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Despicable_Me"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 having decided he is the boss they had been looking for}}.\
In 1991, the brainwashed super-soldier\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bucky_Barnes"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 James "Bucky" Barnes}}\'a0is dispatched from a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hydra_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hydra}}\'a0base in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Siberia"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Siberia}}\'a0to intercept an automobile carrying a case of super-soldier serum. In the present day, approximately one year after\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ultron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ultron}}'s defeat in the nation of Sokovia at the hands of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Avengers_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Avengers}},
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [N 1]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Steve_Rogers_(Marvel_Cinematic_Universe)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Steve Rogers}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Black_Widow_(Natasha_Romanova)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Natasha Romanoff}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Falcon_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sam Wilson}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Scarlet_Witch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Wanda Maximoff}}\'a0stop\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Crossbones_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Brock Rumlow}}\'a0from stealing a biological weapon from a lab in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lagos"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lagos}}. Rumlow blows himself up, attempting to kill Rogers. Maximoff telekinetically contains the explosion and throws it upward, damaging a nearby building and accidentally killing several\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Wakanda"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Wakandan}}\'a0humanitarian workers.\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Secretary_of_State"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 U.S. Secretary of State}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Thunderbolt_Ross"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Thaddeus Ross}}\'a0informs the Avengers that the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_Nations"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 United Nations}}\'a0(UN) is preparing to pass the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Registration_acts_(comics)#Marvel_Cinematic_Universe"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sokovia Accords}}, which will establish a UN panel to oversee and control the team. The Avengers are divided:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tony_Stark_(Marvel_Cinematic_Universe)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tony Stark}}\'a0supports oversight because of his role in Ultron's creation and Sokovia's devastation, while Rogers has more faith in his own judgment than that of a government. Meanwhile,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Helmut_Zemo"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Helmut Zemo}}\'a0tracks down and kills Barnes' old Hydra handler, stealing a book containing the trigger words that activate Barnes' brainwashing. At a conference in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Vienna"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Vienna}}\'a0where the Accords are to be ratified, a bomb kills King\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/T%27Chaka"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 T'Chaka}}\'a0of Wakanda. Security footage indicates the bomber is Barnes, whom T'Chaka's son,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Black_Panther_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 T'Challa}}, vows to kill. Informed by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sharon_Carter"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sharon Carter}}\'a0of Barnes' whereabouts and the authorities' intentions to kill him, Rogers decides to try to bring in Barnes\'97his childhood friend and war comrade\'97himself. Rogers and Wilson track Barnes to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bucharest"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bucharest}}\'a0and attempt to protect him from T'Challa and the authorities, but all four, including T'Challa, are apprehended.\
Impersonating a psychiatrist sent to interview Barnes, Zemo recites the words to make Barnes obey him. He questions Barnes, then sends him on a rampage to cover his own escape. Rogers stops Barnes and sneaks him away. When Barnes regains his senses, he explains that Zemo is the real Vienna bomber and wanted the location of the Siberian Hydra base, where other brainwashed "Winter Soldiers" are kept in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Suspended_animation"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cryogenic stasis}}. Unwilling to wait for authorization to apprehend Zemo, Rogers and Wilson go rogue, and recruit Maximoff,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hawkeye_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Clint Barton}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ant-Man_(Scott_Lang)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Scott Lang}}\'a0to their cause. With Ross's permission, Stark assembles a team composed of Romanoff, T'Challa,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/War_Machine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 James Rhodes}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Vision_(Marvel_Comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Vision}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Spider-Man"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Peter Parker}}\'a0to capture the renegades. Stark's team intercepts Rogers' group at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Leipzig/Halle_Airport"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Leipzig/Halle Airport}}, where they fight until Romanoff allows Rogers and Barnes to escape. The rest of Rogers' team is captured and detained at the Raft prison, while Rhodes is partially paralyzed after being inadvertently shot down by Vision, and Romanoff goes into exile.\
Stark discovers evidence that Barnes was framed by Zemo and convinces Wilson to give him Rogers' destination. Without informing Ross, Stark goes to the Siberian Hydra facility and strikes a truce with Rogers and Barnes, unaware that they were secretly followed by T'Challa. They find that the other super-soldiers have been killed by Zemo, who then shows them footage that reveals that the automobile Barnes had intercepted in 1991 contained Stark's parents, whom Barnes subsequently killed. Enraged that Rogers kept this from him, Stark turns on them both, leading to an intense fight, in which Stark destroys Barnes' robotic arm, and Rogers disables\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Iron_Man%27s_armor_in_other_media#Live_action"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Stark's armor}}. He departs with Barnes, leaving\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Captain_America%27s_shield"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 his shield}}\'a0behind. Satisfied that he has avenged his family's deaths in Sokovia from the Avengers' actions by successfully fracturing them, Zemo attempts suicide, but he is stopped by T'Challa and taken to the authorities.\
In the aftermath, Stark provides Rhodes with exoskeletal leg braces that allow him to walk again, while Rogers breaks his allies out of the Raft. In a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mid-credits_scene"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 mid-credits scene}}, Barnes, granted asylum in Wakanda, chooses to return to cryogenic sleep until a cure for his brainwashing is found. In a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Post-credits_scene"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 post-credits scene}}, Parker explores the features of the web shooters built for him by Stark.\
In 1961, the "{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_fictional_spacecraft"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ark}}", a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cybertron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cybertronian}}\'a0spacecraft carrying an invention capable of ending the war between the benevolent\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Autobot"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Autobots}}\'a0and the malevolent\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Decepticon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Decepticons}}, crash lands on the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Far_side_of_the_Moon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 dark side of Earth's Moon}}. The crash is detected on Earth by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/NASA"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 NASA}}, and President\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/John_F._Kennedy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 John F. Kennedy}}\'a0authorizes a mission to put a man on the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Moon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Moon}}\'a0as a cover for investigating the spacecraft. In 1969, the crew of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Apollo_11"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Apollo 11}}\'a0lands on the Moon.\
In the present, the Autobots assist the United States military in preventing major conflicts around the globe. During a mission to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chernobyl"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Chernobyl}}\'a0to investigate suspected alien technology,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Optimus_Prime"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Optimus Prime}}\'a0finds a fuel cell from the "Ark", discovering that it had survived its journey from Cybertron. The Autobots are then attacked by a giant Cybertronian worm called the Driller and his master\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shockwave_(Transformers)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shockwave}}, a Decepticon scientist, who manages to escape. After learning of the top-secret mission to the Moon, the Autobots travel there to explore the "Ark". They discover a comatose\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sentinel_Prime"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sentinel Prime}}\'97Optimus's predecessor as leader of the Autobots\'97and five Pillars he created as a means of establishing a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Transformers_technology"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Space Bridge}}\'a0between two points to teleport matter. After returning to Earth, Optimus uses the energy of his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Matrix_of_Leadership"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Matrix of Leadership}}\'a0to revive Sentinel Prime.\
Meanwhile,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Transformers_film_series_characters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sam Witwicky}}\'a0is frustrated that he is unable to work with the Autobots or find a job. He also becomes envious of the close relationship between his new girlfriend,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Carly_Witwicky"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Carly Spencer}}, and her boss\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Transformers_film_series_cast_and_characters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dylan Gould}}. After finding work, Sam is provided information by his eccentric co-worker Jerry Wang about the "Ark", before Jerry is assassinated by the Decepticon\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_The_Transformers_(TV_series)_characters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Laserbeak}}. Sam contacts the now independently wealthy Sector 7 Agent Seymour Simmons, and together they realize the Decepticons and their leader\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Megatron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Megatron}}\'a0are murdering people connected to the American and Soviet space missions to the "Ark". They locate two surviving cosmonauts, who reveal satellite photos of hundreds of Pillars being stockpiled on the Moon. Sam realizes that the Decepticons raided the "Ark" long before the Apollo 11 mission to the moon and intentionally left Sentinel and the five Pillars for the Autobots to find, as Sentinel is the key to activating the Pillars and the Decepticons lacked the means to revive him. The Autobots fight off three pursuing Decepticons: the Dreads, and rush to return Sentinel to their base for protection, but Sentinel betrays them and murders the Autobot\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ironhide"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ironhide}}, revealing he had made a deal with Megatron to ensure Cybertron's survival.\
Sentinel uses the Pillars to transport hundreds of concealed Decepticons from the Moon to Earth. Carly is later captured by Dylan, who is revealed to be in service of the Decepticons. The Autobots are exiled from Earth at the demand of the Decepticons to avoid war, but as their ship leaves Earth it is destroyed by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Starscream"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Starscream}}, seemingly killing the Autobots. The Decepticons, led by Megatron and Sentinel, invade\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chicago"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Chicago}}\'a0as their agents place Pillars around the world. Dylan reveals to Carly that the Decepticons plan to transport their homeworld Cybertron to the Solar System, and then enslave humanity and use Earth's resources to rebuild their world. Sam teams up with former\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Air_Force"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 USAF}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chief_master_sergeant"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Chief}}\'a0Robert Epps and several ex-NEST soldiers to go into Chicago to save Carly and arrest Dylan, but they are nearly killed by Decepticon forces before the Autobots intervene, revealing they concealed themselves during the launch of their ship to convince the Decepticons they were destroyed.\
Working together, the Autobots, along with several ex-{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Army_Rangers"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rangers}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Navy_SEALs"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Navy SEALs}}, manage to rescue Carly and kill Laserbeak, the Driller, Starscream,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Soundwave_(Transformers)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Soundwave}}, and Shockwave, with Optimus using Shockwave's arm-cannon to blast the Control Pillar, disabling the Space Bridge. During the battle, the Autobot Wheeljack is killed while Wheelie and Brains sneak on board a Decepticon warship and sabotage it. Sam confronts Dylan as he reactivates the Control Pillar, and knocks Dylan into the Pillar, killing him.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bumblebee_(Transformers)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bumblebee}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ratchet_(Transformers)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ratchet}}\'a0arrive and destroy the Control Pillar, permanently disabling the Bridge and causing the partially transported Cybertron to implode. Optimus and Sentinel fight while Carly convinces Megatron that he will be replaced by Sentinel as leader of the Decepticons. Sentinel severs Optimus's right arm and is about to execute him until Megatron, having listened to Carly, intervenes, incapacitating Sentinel. Megatron slyly proposes a truce, having the desire to become the one in charge again, but Optimus instead attacks Megatron, decapitating and killing him. Sentinel pleads for his life, but Optimus executes him too for his betrayal. With the Decepticons defeated, Carly and Sam are reunited and the Autobots accept that, with Cybertron gone for good, Earth is now their home.\
In 1985\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Maine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Maine}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lighthouse_keeper"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 lighthouse keeper}}\'a0Thomas Curry rescues\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_minor_DC_Comics_characters#Atlanna"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Atlanna}}, the princess of the underwater nation of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Atlantis_(DC_Comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Atlantis}}, during a storm. They eventually fall in love and have a son named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aquaman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Arthur}}, who is born with the power to communicate with marine lifeforms. Atlanna is forced to abandon her family and return to Atlantis, entrusting to her advisor,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nuidis_Vulko"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nuidis Vulko}}, the mission of training Arthur. Under Vulko's guidance, Arthur becomes a skilled warrior but rejects Atlantis upon learning that Atlanna was executed for having a half-breed son.\
In the present, one year after\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Steppenwolf_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Steppenwolf}}'s invasion,
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [N 1]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \'a0Arthur confronts a group of pirates attempting to hijack a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Russian_Navy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Russian Naval}}\'a0nuclear submarine. Their leader, Jesse Kane, dies during the confrontation while his son,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Black_Manta"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 David}}, vows revenge. David later targets Atlantis at the behest of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ocean_Master"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Orm}}, Arthur's younger half-brother and Atlantis' incumbent monarch who uses the attack as a pretext to declare war on the surface world. King Nereus of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Atlantis_(DC_Comics)#Xebel"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Xebel}}\'a0swears allegiance to Orm's cause, but his daughter\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mera_(comics)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mera}}, who has been betrothed to Orm, refuses to aid them and journeys to the surface to ask Arthur for help, earning his trust by saving Thomas from a tsunami sent by Orm. Arthur reluctantly accompanies Mera to a rendezvous with Vulko, who urges Arthur to find the Trident of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_minor_DC_Comics_characters#Atlan"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Atlan}}, a magic artifact that once belonged to Atlantis' first ruler, in order to reclaim his rightful place as king. They are ambushed by Orm's men and Mera and Vulko escape without having been seen, while Arthur is captured.\
