Although Baloo and Bagheera are impressed, Baloo realizes that he cannot guarantee Mowgli's safety after learning that he is being hunted by Shere Khan. Baloo agrees to push Mowgli away to get him to continue onward to the man village.\
Mowgli is kidnapped by a gang of monkeys known as the "{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bandar-log"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bandar-log}}", who present him to their leader, a giant ape named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/King_Louie"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 King Louie}}. Assuming that all humans can make fire, King Louie offers Mowgli protection from Shere Khan in exchange for it. Baloo distracts King Louie while Bagheera tries to sneak him out, but their plan is discovered. As King Louie chases Mowgli through his temple, he informs Mowgli of Akela's death. King Louie's rampage eventually causes his temple to collapse on top of him.\
Furious that Baloo and Bagheera never told him about Akela's death, Mowgli goes to confront Shere Khan alone. He steals a lit torch at the village to use as a weapon and heads back to the jungle, accidentally starting a wildfire in the process. He confronts Shere Khan, who argues that Mowgli has made himself the enemy of the jungle by causing the wildfire. Mowgli throws the torch into the water, giving Shere Khan the advantage. Baloo, Bagheera, and the wolf pack intervene and hold Shere Khan off, giving Mowgli enough time to set a trap. He lures Shere Khan up a dead tree and onto a branch, which breaks under the tiger's weight, and Shere Khan falls into the fire to his death. Mowgli then directs the elephants to divert the river and put out the fire. In the aftermath, Raksha becomes the new leader of the wolf pack. Mowgli decides to utilize his equipment and tricks for his own use, having found his true home and calling with his wolf family, Baloo and Bagheera.\
In order to control the oceans, Lord\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cutler_Beckett"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cutler Beckett}}\'a0executes anyone associated with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Piracy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 piracy}}\'a0in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Port_Royal"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Port Royal}}\'a0by ordering\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Davy_Jones_(Pirates_of_the_Caribbean)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Davy Jones}}\'a0to destroy all pirate ships in the seas. Condemned prisoners sing "{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hoist_the_Colours"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hoist the Colours}}" to compel the nine Pirate Lords to convene at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shipwreck_Cove"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shipwreck Cove}}\'a0to hold the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Brethren_Court"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Brethren Court}}. Because\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Jack_Sparrow"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Captain Jack Sparrow}}, Pirate Lord of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Caribbean_Sea"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Caribbean Sea}}, never named a successor before being dragged to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Davy_Jones_locker"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Davy Jones locker}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Captain_Barbossa"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Captain Barbossa}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Will_Turner"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Will Turner}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Elizabeth_Swann"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Elizabeth Swann}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tia_Dalma"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tia Dalma}}, and the crew of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Black_Pearl"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Black Pearl}}\'a0plot to rescue Jack. Traveling to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Singapore"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Singapore}}, the crew meet\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Captain_Sao_Feng"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Captain Sao Feng}}\'a0(Pirate Lord of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/South_China_Sea"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 South China Sea}}), who owns navigational charts to the Locker. Beckett's soldiers invade, but the crew escape. Will secretly promises to give Jack to Feng in return for the\'a0
\f1\i Pearl
\f0\i0 , which he will use to rescue his father\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bootstrap_Bill_Turner"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bootstrap Bill Turner}}\'a0from the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Flying_Dutchman_(Pirates_of_the_Caribbean)"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Flying Dutchman}}.\
The crew travels to the Locker and rescues Jack. The crew encounters many dead souls, including Elizabeth's father\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Weatherby_Swann"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Governor Swann}}, who was executed by Beckett. Tia Dalma reveals that the Goddess Calypso charged Davy Jones with the job to guide the souls of those who died at sea to the next world. Once every ten years he could come ashore to be with the woman he loved. But he corrupted his purpose and was cursed to become a monster. The soul of Governor Swann reveals that the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 \'a0must always have a captain.\
Returning to the living world, the\'a0
\f1\i Pearl
\f0\i0 \'a0stops at an island for fresh water, where the crew find the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kraken_(Pirates_of_the_Caribbean)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Kraken}}\'a0lying dead on the beach, having been killed by Jones under orders from Beckett. They are then attacked by Sao Feng and Beckett's men. Through a complex series of deals, Elizabeth is handed over to Feng, who believes she is the goddess\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Calypso_(mythology)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Calypso}}, while the rest of the crew make for Shipwreck Cove aboard the\'a0
\f1\i Pearl
\f0\i0 . Jack throws Will off the ship as part of the plan to seize control of the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 . Sao Feng tells Elizabeth that the first Brethren Court bound Calypso in human form after she betrayed her lover, Davy Jones. He plans to release her to defeat Beckett. Davy Jones attacks Feng's ship, the\'a0
\f1\i Empress
\f0\i0 , mortally wounding Feng in the process. Feng appoints Elizabeth his successor as Pirate Lord before dying. Elizabeth and the crew are locked in the brig of the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 , where she finds a partially insane Bootstrap Bill Turner. In a moment of clarity, Bootstrap reveals that whoever kills Davy Jones must take his place, bound to serve the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 \'a0forever. He reiterates that "the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 \'a0must always have a captain."\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/James_Norrington"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Admiral Norrington}}\'a0frees Elizabeth and her new crew from the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 , but is killed by Bootstrap Bill.\
The\'a0
\f1\i Black Pearl
\f0\i0 \'a0arrives at Shipwreck Cove, where Barbossa attempts to persuade the Brethren Court to release Calypso. Davy Jones visits Tia Dalma in the\'a0
\f1\i Pearl
\f0\i0 's brig, revealing she is Calypso. Jack's father\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Pirates_of_the_Caribbean_characters#Captain_Teague"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Captain Teague}}, Keeper of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pirate_Code"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Pirate Code}}, informs the Court that only an elected Pirate King can decide on going into battle. A vote is taken. To avoid a stalemate, Jack casts his vote for Elizabeth, making her King.\
The Brethren Court and Beckett's fleets emerge for war. On a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sandbank"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 sandbank}}, Elizabeth, Jack, Barbossa, Beckett, Jones, and Will\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Parley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 parley}}, trading Will for Jack. Barbossa steals Jack's piece of eight, all of which are owned by the Pirate Lords and required to free Calypso. Barbossa frees Calypso, but when Will reveals it was Jones who betrayed her and made it possible for the first Court to imprison her, Calypso vanishes and summons an enormous\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Whirlpool"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 maelstrom}}.\
The\'a0
\f1\i Pearl
\f0\i0 \'a0and the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 \'a0battle in the maelstrom. Elizabeth and Will are wed by Barbossa. On board the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 , Jones and Jack engage in a duel for control of Davy Jones' heart. Jones stabs Will, mortally wounding him. Jack gives up his chance for immortality and instead helps Will stab the heart, killing Jones, whose body falls into the maelstrom. Jack and Elizabeth escape the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 \'a0as it is sucked into the maelstrom.\
As Beckett's ship, the\'a0
\f1\i Endeavour
\f0\i0 , approaches to destroy the\'a0
\f1\i Pearl
\f0\i0 , the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 \'a0rises from the sea, now captained by Will; the crew has been freed from Jones' curse. Together, the two pirate ships destroy the\'a0
\f1\i Endeavour
\f0\i0 . A stunned Beckett goes down with his ship while his navy retreats. With Will now forever bound to escort souls lost at sea to the next world, he and Elizabeth bid farewell to each other on the beach of an abandoned island. Will departs on the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 , leaving Elizabeth pregnant and with the chest containing his heart.\
Jack and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Joshamee_Gibbs"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Joshamee Gibbs}}\'a0discover Barbossa has stolen the\'a0
\f1\i Black Pearl
\f0\i0 \'a0again, but Jack planned ahead and stole Sao Feng's navigational charts. He departs from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tortuga_(Haiti)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tortuga}}\'a0alone to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pirates_of_the_Caribbean:_On_Stranger_Tides"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 track down the mythical Fountain of Youth}}.\
In a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Post-credits_scene"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 post-credits scene}}, set ten years later, Elizabeth and her son\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Pirates_of_the_Caribbean_characters#Henry_Turner"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Henry}}\'a0watch from a sea cliff as Will returns aboard the\'a0
\f1\i Dutchman
\f0\i0 .\
In Brantford,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_Hampshire"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New Hampshire}}\'a0(1996), teenager Alex Vreeke is given the Jumanji\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Board_game"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 board game}}\'a0by his father, who found it on a beach. Uninterested, he sets the game aside. That night, it transforms into a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Video_game"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 video game}}{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/ROM_cartridge"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cartridge}}\'a0which catches Alex's attention when he is awakened by the Jumanji drum beats. When he begins playing it, he disappears into the game.\
Twenty years later, four students at Brantford High School are given detention: Spencer Gilpin and his former friend Anthony "Fridge" Johnson for cheating, Bethany Walker for making a phone call during class, and Martha Kaply for talking back to her gym teacher and refusing to participate. In the school basement, where they are serving their detention, Fridge discovers Alex's discarded video-game system, and he and Spencer decide to play. Although it has five\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Avatar_(computing)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 playable characters}}, they are unable to select the first one, so they choose two others, and convince the girls to play as the remaining two. When Spencer presses "Start", they are transported into the game.\
They land in a jungle, in the forms of their game avatars. Spencer is a tough, muscular explorer and archaeologist named Dr. Smolder Bravestone; Fridge is a diminutive zoologist named Franklin "Mouse" Finbar; Bethany is an overweight male cartographer named Professor Sheldon Oberon; and Martha is a female commando and martial arts expert named Ruby Roundhouse. They each have three lives marked on their arms and Bethany immediately loses one after being eaten by a hippo. Spencer deduces that if they lose all three, they die for real.\
They learn the game's story from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Non-player_character"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 NPC}}\'a0Nigel: corrupt archeologist Russel Van Pelt stole the Jaguar's Eye, a magic jewel, from its shrine, cursing Jumanji. Nigel escaped Van Pelt with the jewel, and the players must return it to a jaguar statue to lift the curse, and call "Jumanji" to leave the game. Nigel warns them that Van Pelt will stop at nothing to retrieve the jewel, which gives him control of Jumanji's animals; Van Pelt himself is possessed by its power. They begin tackling the game's increasingly-difficult "levels", losing lives as they do so. The four are rescued by Alex, the missing fifth player, whose avatar is pilot Jefferson "Seaplane" McDonough. Taking shelter in a jungle house built by the game's previous player Alan Parrish, Alex believes that he has been in the game for a few months and is distressed to learn that it is really twenty years. The newcomers vow to help him return home. They break into a transportation shed, commandeering a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Helicopter"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 helicopter}}\'a0to fly to the jaguar statue and return the jewel, but Fridge drops the jewel into a herd of white rhinoceros. Spencer sacrifices one of Fridge's lives, pushing him out of the helicopter as a distraction, and retrieves the jewel. Alex loses his last life when a mosquito bites him, but Bethany performs\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/CPR"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 CPR}}\'a0and transfers one of her lives to him.\
At the statue, the players are surrounded by a pack of jaguars and Van Pelt's forces. They outmaneuver their opposition while Spencer and Martha race to the statue. Van Pelt confronts Martha and demands the jewel, but she purposely gets a snake to bite her, allowing her to respawn and to get the jewel to Spencer. With the players on their last lives, they end the game, with Van Pelt disintegrating into a bunch of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rat"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 rats}}, and return to the school basement, though without Alex. They find the formerly-dilapidated Vreeke home restored and decorated for a Christmas family gathering. An adult Alex arrives, having returned to 1996 when the game ended. Now married with children, he reveals he named his eldest daughter after Bethany out of gratitude for saving his life.\
Spencer and Fridge reconcile, Bethany begins caring for others more than herself and plans a summer wilderness backpacking adventure, Martha and Spencer become romantically involved and the four are now friends after their experiences in the game. When they hear Jumanji's drumbeats, they bring the game behind the school and Fridge destroys it with a bowling ball to prevent anyone from playing it.\
The\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Minister of Magic}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rufus Scrimgeour}}\'a0addresses the wizarding media, stating that the Ministry remains strong despite\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lord_Voldemort"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lord Voldemort}}\'a0gaining power and the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eaters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Death Eaters}}\'a0committing mass killings of Muggles and infiltrating the Ministry. Meanwhile,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Harry_Potter_(character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Harry Potter}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ron_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ron Weasley}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hermione_Granger"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hermione Granger}}\'a0resolve to complete the mission\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Albus Dumbledore}}\'a0gave Harry by hunting down and destroying Voldemort's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Horcrux"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Horcruxes}}.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Severus_Snape"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Severus Snape}}\'a0informs Voldemort of Harry's impending departure from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Privet_Drive"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Privet Drive}}. Voldemort commandeers\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lucius Malfoy}}'s wand, due to his own wand sharing the same core as Harry's and therefore being unable to kill him.\
The\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix_(organisation)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Order of the Phoenix}}\'a0escort Harry to safety using\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Polyjuice Potion}}. During their flight, they are ambushed by Death Eaters who kill\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mad-Eye_Moody"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mad-Eye Moody}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hedwig_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hedwig}}, injure\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/George_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 George Weasley}}, and incapacitate\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rubeus Hagrid}}. Arriving at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Burrow_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 The Burrow}}, Harry has a vision of the wand-maker\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ollivander"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ollivander}}\'a0being tortured by Voldemort. The next day, Scrimgeour arrives with Dumbledore's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Will_and_testament"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 will}}. Ron receives Dumbledore's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Deluminator"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Deluminator}}, Hermione receives a copy of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 The Tales of Beedle the Bard}}
\f1\i ,
\f0\i0 \'a0and Harry receives the first Golden Snitch that he caught in a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Quidditch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Quidditch}}\'a0match. Scrimgeour reveals that Harry was also bequeathed the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sword of Gryffindor}}, which has gone missing.\
The Death Eaters kill Scrimgeour and replace him with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pius_Thicknesse"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Pius Thicknesse}}. The Ministry begins arresting and persecuting Muggle-born witches and wizards. Death Eaters also attack during\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bill_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bill Weasley}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fleur_Delacour"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fleur Delacour}}'s wedding.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Kingsley Shacklebolt}}'s patronus charm forewarns the wedding party, and most escape. Harry, Hermione, and Ron\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Disapparate"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 disapparate}}\'a0to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/London"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 London}}, but are attacked in a diner by Death Eaters. The trio seek refuge at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Number_12,_Grimmauld_Place"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Number 12, Grimmauld Place}}. They discover that the "R.A.B." from the fake Horcrux locket is\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Regulus_Arcturus_Black"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Regulus Arcturus Black}}, younger brother of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sirius_Black"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sirius Black}}.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kreacher"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Kreacher}}, the Blacks' house elf, tells them that\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mundungus Fletcher}}broke in and stole many items from the house, including the real locket. Kreacher and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dobby_the_house_elf"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dobby}}\'a0apprehend Fletcher, who reveals that the locket is in the possession of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dolores Umbridge}}. Using Polyjuice Potion, the trio infiltrate the Ministry and find the locket around Umbridge's neck. Harry stuns Umbridge and Hermione retrieves the locket. The trio escape their pursuers by apparating in the wilderness, but Ron is injured and cannot apparate again until he recovers.\
After unsuccessful attempts to destroy the Horcrux, the trio take turns wearing it to dilute its power. Harry sees a vision of Voldemort interrogating and killing the wand-maker\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gregorovitch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gregorovitch}}, who claims a teenage boy stole the legendary\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Elder_Wand"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Elder Wand}}\'a0from his shop. While Ron is wearing the locket, he is overcome by negative feelings and argues with Harry before abandoning him and Hermione. Hermione deduces that the Sword of Gryffindor can destroy Horcruxes and decides to go with Harry to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Godric's Hollow}}. They visit Harry's parents' graves and the house where they were killed. They encounter\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bathilda Bagshot}}, who they believe may have the sword. Bathilda lets them into her house before revealing herself as\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nagini_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nagini}}, possessing Bathilda's reanimated corpse. Hermione and Harry escape into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Forest_of_Dean"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Forest of Dean}}, but Hermione accidentally breaks Harry's wand whilst fighting Nagini. She identifies the mysterious thief in Harry's vision as\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gellert Grindelwald}}.\
Harry sees a Patronus in the form of a doe, which leads him to a frozen pond. Gryffindor's sword lies beneath the pond's ice, which Harry breaks and jumps into. The locket around his neck strangles Harry, but Ron arrives and rescues him. Harry uses\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Parseltongue"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 parseltongue}}\'a0to open the Horcrux locket, which Ron eventually decides to destroy. Hermione and Ron reconcile, and the trio decide to visit\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Xenophilius Lovegood}}\'a0to learn more about a symbol left in the book Dumbledore left Hermione. Lovegood explains to them that the symbol represents the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Deathly_Hallows_(objects)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Deathly Hallows}}, three magical objects that can make a wizard master of Death. Hermione reads the story of the Hallows, after which the trio awkwardly attempt to leave but are stopped by Lovegood. He reveals that\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Luna_Lovegood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Luna Lovegood}}\'a0has been kidnapped and then summons the Death Eaters, intending to hand over Harry in exchange for her. Harry, Ron, and Hermione disapparate as Lovegood's house is destroyed.\
Back in the wilderness, the trio set up camp when Snatchers find them. Hermione uses a curse to disguise Harry as the Snatchers take them to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Malfoy_Manor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Malfoy Manor}}.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bellatrix Lestrange}}\'a0imprisons Harry and Ron in the cellar with Luna, Ollivander, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Griphook"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Griphook}}\'a0the goblin. Bellatrix tortures Hermione for information on the Sword, which Bellatrix claims was in her vault at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gringott%27s"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gringott's}}. Harry requests help, communicating with a broken mirror in his possession. Dobby apparates into the cellar to save them. Harry and Ron rush to save Hermione, and a battle ensues that sees Harry disarm\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Draco_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Draco Malfoy}}. Dobby drops a chandelier onto Bellatrix, forcing her to release Hermione. Bellatrix throws her knife at them as Dobby grabs everyone and disapparates. They arrive at Shell Cottage to find that Bellatrix's knife has fatally wounded Dobby. Harry insists that they bury Dobby without any magic. Meanwhile, Voldemort breaks into Dumbledore's tomb and steals the Elder Wand, revealed to have been in Dumbledore's possession.\
Thorin and his company are being pursued by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Azog"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Azog}}\'a0and his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Orc_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Orc}}\'a0party following the events of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Hobbit:_An_Unexpected_Journey#Plot"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 the previous film}}. They are ushered along by Gandalf to the nearby home of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Beorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Beorn}}, a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shapeshifting"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 skin-changer}}\'a0who can take the form of the bear. That night, Azog is summoned to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dol_Guldur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dol Guldur}}\'a0by the Necromancer, who commands him to marshal his forces for war, so Azog delegates the hunt for Thorin to his son\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bolg"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bolg}}. The following day, Beorn escorts the company to the borders of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mirkwood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mirkwood}}, where Gandalf discovers\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Black_Speech"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Black Speech}}\'a0imprinted on an old ruin. Heeding a promise he made to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Galadriel"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Galadriel}}, he warns the company to remain on the path and leaves to investigate the tombs of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nazg%C3%BBl"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nazg\'fbl}}. Upon entering the forest, the dwarves lose their way and are ensnared by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Great_Spiders_of_Mirkwood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 giant spiders}}. Bilbo sets about freeing them with the help of his recently acquired\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/One_Ring"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 invisibility ring}}. He subsequently drops the ring and first begins to understand its dark influence after he brutally kills a creature to retrieve it.\
The remaining spiders are fended off by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Silvan_Elves"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Wood-elves}}\'a0led by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tauriel"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tauriel}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Legolas"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Legolas}}. They also capture the Dwarves and bring Thorin before their king\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Thranduil"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Thranduil}}. Thorin confronts Thranduil about his neglect of the Dwarves of Erebor following\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Smaug"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Smaug}}'s attack 60 years earlier, and is consequently imprisoned with the other Dwarves. Bilbo, having avoided capture, arranges an escape using empty wine barrels that are sent downstream. While being pursued by the Wood-elves, they are ambushed by Bolg and his Orc party, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/K%C3%ADli"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 K\'edli}}\'a0is wounded with a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Middle-earth_weapons_and_armour#Knives"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Morgul shaft}}. They engage in a running three-way battle down the river, but ultimately the Dwarves are able to escape both groups of pursuers. Thranduil then seals off his kingdom when an Orc captive reveals an evil entity has returned and is amassing an army in the south, but Tauriel decides to leave and assist the Dwarves, and Legolas goes after her. Meanwhile, Gandalf and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Radagast"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Radagast}}\'a0go to investigate the tombs of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nazg%C3%BBl"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nazg\'fbl}}, which they find to be empty.\
The company are smuggled into\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Esgaroth"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Esgaroth}}\'a0by a bargeman called\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bard_the_Bowman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bard}}, but are discovered raiding the town armory for new weapons. Thorin promises the Master, his councilor Alfrid, and the people of Laketown a share of the mountain's treasure, and it is revealed that Bard is a descendant of the last ruler of Dale, and possesses the last black arrow capable of killing Smaug. K\'edli is forced to remain behind, tended to by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Middle-earth_Dwarves#F%C3%ADli"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 F\'edli}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Middle-earth_Dwarves#%C3%93in,_son_of_Gl%C3%B3in"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 \'d3in}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Middle-earth_Dwarves#Bofur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bofur}}, as the remaining company receive a grand farewell. Meanwhile, Gandalf travels south to the ruins of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dol_Guldur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dol Guldur}}, while Radagast leaves to warn\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Galadriel"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Galadriel}}\'a0of their discovery at the tombs of the Nazg\'fbl. Gandalf finds the ruins infested with Orcs and is ambushed by Azog. The Necromancer overpowers Gandalf and reveals himself as\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sauron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sauron}}.\
Thorin and his remaining company reach the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lonely_Mountain"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lonely Mountain}}, where Bilbo discovers the hidden entrance. He is sent in to retrieve the Arkenstone, and while doing so, he accidentally awakens Smaug. While trying to find Bilbo, Smaug reveals his knowledge of Sauron's return. Back in Laketown, Bard attempts to bring the black arrow to the town's launcher, as he fears what may happen when the Dwarves enter the mountain. However, he is arrested by the Master and Alfrid in the process and leaves his son to hide the arrow. Bolg and his Orc party infiltrate the town and attack the four Dwarves, but are quickly dispatched by Tauriel and Legolas. Tauriel then tends to K\'edli, while Legolas leaves in pursuit of Bolg. Meanwhile, Gandalf watches helplessly as Azog and an Orc army march from Dol Guldur towards the Lonely Mountain.\
Back inside the mountain, during a long chase, Bilbo and the Dwarves rekindle the mountain's forge using Smaug's flames to create and melt a large golden statue of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Thr%C3%B3r"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Thr\'f3r}}, hoping to bury Smaug alive in the molten gold. They do so, but Smaug emerges from the gold, storms out of the mountain and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Hobbit:_The_Battle_of_the_Five_Armies"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 flies off to destroy Laketown}}\'a0as Bilbo watches in horror.\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bilbo_Baggins"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bilbo}}\'a0and the Dwarves watch from the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lonely_Mountain"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lonely Mountain}}\'a0as the dragon\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Smaug"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Smaug}}\'a0sets\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Esgaroth"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Laketown}}\'a0ablaze.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bard_the_Bowman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bard}}\'a0breaks out of prison, and eventually kills Smaug with the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Middle-earth_weapons_and_armour#Black_Arrow"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 black arrow}}\'a0brought to him by his son\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_kings_of_Dale"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bain}}. Smaug's falling body crushes the fleeing Master of Laketown and his cronies, who were escaping on a boat laden with the town's gold. Bard reluctantly becomes the new leader of the people of Laketown, with the Master's conniving servant, Alfrid, acting as Bard's reluctant servant, as they seek refuge in the ruins of Dale, while\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Legolas"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Legolas}}\'a0travels to investigate\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_minor_places_in_Middle-earth#Mount_Gundabad"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mount Gundabad}}\'a0with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tauriel"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tauriel}}. Thorin, now struck with "dragon sickness" over the vast treasure in the mountain, searches obsessively for the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Arkenstone"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Arkenstone}}, which Bilbo had previously found but kept hidden. Thorin, hearing that Laketown survivors have fled to Dale, orders the entrance of the Lonely Mountain sealed off.\
Meanwhile,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Galadriel"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Galadriel}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Elrond"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Elrond}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Saruman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Saruman}}\'a0arrive at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dol_Guldur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dol Guldur}}\'a0and free\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gandalf"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gandalf}}, sending him to safety with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Radagast"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Radagast}}. They battle and defeat the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nazg%C3%BBl"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nazg\'fbl}}\'a0and a formless\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sauron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sauron}}\'a0himself, banishing them to the East.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Azog"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Azog}}, marching on Erebor with his vast Orc army, sends his son\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bolg"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bolg}}\'a0to Gundabad to summon their second army. Legolas and Tauriel witness the march of Bolg's army, bolstered by Orc berserkers and giant bats.\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Thranduil"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Thranduil}}\'a0and an Elf army arrive in Dale and form an alliance with Bard in order to reclaim a treasure once withheld from them by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Middle-earth_dwarf_characters#Thr%C3%B3r"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Thr\'f3r}}. Bard goes to the mountain and asks Thorin for the share of gold that he had previously promised the people of Laketown, but Thorin refuses. Gandalf arrives at Dale to warn Bard and Thranduil of the threat posed by Azog, but Thranduil dismisses him. Bilbo sneaks out of Erebor to hand the Arkenstone over to Thranduil and Bard so that they can trade it for the treasures they were promised and prevent a battle. When Bard's and Thranduil's armies gather at the gates of Erebor, offering to trade the Arkenstone for the promised treasures, Thorin angrily refuses to believe they have the Arkenstone until Bilbo admits giving it away and chides Thorin for letting greed cloud his judgement. Outraged by what he sees as betrayal, Thorin nearly kills Bilbo, but Gandalf appears and shames Thorin into releasing Bilbo. Thorin's cousin\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/D%C3%A1in_II_Ironfoot"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 D\'e1in}}\'a0arrives with his Dwarf army, and a battle of Dwarves against Elves and Men ensues, until\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Wereworms"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Wereworms}}\'a0emerge from the ground, releasing Azog's army from their tunnels. With the Orcs outnumbering D\'e1in's army, Thranduil and Bard's forces, along with Gandalf and Bilbo, join the battle, fighting the Orcs. However, a second front is opened when many Orcs, Ogres, and Trolls attack Dale, forcing Bard to withdraw his forces to defend the city, while Alfrid takes a bunch of gold and flees from Dale to his ultimate fate.\
Inside Erebor, Thorin suffers traumatic hallucinations before regaining his sanity and leading his company to join the battle. He rides towards\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ravenhill_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ravenhill}}\'a0with Dwalin, F\'edli, and K\'edli to kill Azog; Bilbo follows them, using\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/One_Ring"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 his magic ring}}\'a0to move through the combat unseen. Meanwhile, Tauriel and Legolas arrive to warn the Dwarves of Bolg's approaching army. F\'edli is captured, and Azog kills him as Bilbo and the other Dwarves are forced to watch. As Thorin engages Azog in a fight to the death, Bolg knocks Bilbo unconscious, overpowers Tauriel and then kills K\'edli, who had come to her aid. Legolas battles Bolg and eventually kills him. Thorin kills Azog, but is fatally wounded in the process. The\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Eagle_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Great Eagles}}\'a0arrive with Radagast and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Beorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Beorn}}\'a0to fight the newly arriving Orc army, and the Orcs are finally defeated. Bilbo regains consciousness and makes peace with the dying Thorin. Tauriel mourns Kili, and Thranduil acknowledges their love. Legolas then tells Thranduil he must leave, and Thranduil advises him to seek out a Dunedain ranger in the north who goes by the name\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aragorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 "Strider"}}.\
As Thorin's company begin settling back into Erebor (with D\'e1in now the king), and Dale begins to recover with Bard as the leader, Bilbo bids farewell to the company's remaining members and journeys home to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shire_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 the Shire}}with Gandalf. As the two part ways on the outskirts of the Shire, Gandalf admits his knowledge of Bilbo's ring and warns him that magic rings are not to be used lightly. Bilbo returns to Bag End to find his belongings being auctioned off because he was presumed dead. He cancels the sale, but finds his home pillaged; he starts to tidy up and to settle back in.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Lord_of_the_Rings:_The_Fellowship_of_the_Ring"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sixty years later}}, Bilbo receives a visit from Gandalf on his 111th birthday.\
A\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Amphiprioninae"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 clownfish}}\'a0couple, Marlin and Coral, are admiring their new home in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Great_Barrier_Reef"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Great Barrier Reef}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Australia"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Australia}}, and their clutch of hundreds of eggs, when a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Barracuda"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 barracuda}}\'a0attacks. Marlin is knocked unconscious, and wakes up to find Coral and all but one of the eggs eaten by the barracuda. He names this last egg\'a0
\f1\i Nemo
\f0\i0 , a name that Coral had chosen.\
On the first day of school, the overprotective Marlin embarrasses Nemo during a field trip. While Marlin talks to the teacher, Mr. Ray, Nemo sneaks away from the reef toward a boat and is captured by a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Scuba_diver"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 scuba diver}}. As the boat departs, one of the divers accidentally knocks his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Diving_mask"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 diving mask}}\'a0overboard. Marlin chases after the boat and meets Dory, a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Paracanthurus"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 blue tang}}\'a0who suffers from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Short-term_memory_loss"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 short-term memory loss}}. The two encounter Bruce, Anchor and Chum, three reformed sharks who have renounced fish-eating diet. While at their\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Twelve-step_program"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 progress meeting}}, Marlin discovers the diver's mask and notices an address written on it. However, Dory and Marlin fight over the mask, accidentally giving Dory a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bloody_nose"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 bloody nose}}. The blood sends Bruce into an insane\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Feeding_frenzy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 feeding frenzy}}, and he attacks Marlin and Dory, who narrowly escape.\
Nemo is placed in an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aquarium"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 aquarium}}\'a0in a dentist's office, where he meets the "Tank Gang", a group of pet fish including\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Porcupinefish"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 porcupinefish}}\'a0Bloat,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cleaner_shrimp"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cleaner shrimp}}\'a0Jacques,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dascyllus_melanurus"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 striped damselfish}}\'a0Deb,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Royal_gramma"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 royal gramma}}\'a0Gurgle,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sea_star"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 sea star}}\'a0Peach, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Yellow_tang"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 yellow tang}}\'a0Bubbles, led by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Moorish_idol"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Moorish idol}}, Gill. The gang learn Nemo is to be given to the dentist's niece Darla, who has killed previous fish given to her. Gill devises a plan to escape: jam the aquarium's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Filter_(aquarium)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 filter}}\'a0with a pebble so the dentist will have to put the fish in plastic bags to clean the tank, then roll out the window and into the harbor. Nemo attempts to jam the filter but fails, nearly dying in the process.\
The mask falls into a trench in the deep sea, where, while battling an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Anglerfish"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 anglerfish}}, Dory reads the address as "42 Wallaby Way,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sydney"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sydney}}". To her own disbelief, Dory remembers the address despite her short-term memory loss. Dory and Marlin receive directions to Sydney from a school of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Silver_moony"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 moonfish}}. On the way, they encounter a bloom of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Jellyfish"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 jellyfish}}\'a0that traps and nearly stings them to death. Marlin loses consciousness and awakens on the back of a sea turtle named Crush, who shuttles Marlin and Dory on the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/East_Australian_Current"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 East Australian Current}}. Marlin tells the story of his journey to a group of young sea turtles led by Crush's son Squirt. News of his quest spreads across the ocean. Near the harbor, a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pelican"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 pelican}}\'a0named Nigel flies to the dentist's office and brings news of Marlin's efforts. Inspired, Nemo makes a second attempt to jam the filter. He succeeds, but the dentist installs a new high-tech filter before the Tank Gang can escape.\
Marlin and Dory exit the East Australian Current and are engulfed by a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Blue_whale"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 blue whale}}. Dory communicates with the whale, which carries them to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sydney_Harbour"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sydney Harbour}}\'a0and expels them through his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Blowhole_(anatomy)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 blowhole}}. They meet Nigel, who helps the pair escape from a flock of relentless\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gull"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 seagulls}}\'a0and takes them to the dentist's office. Darla has just arrived, and the dentist is handing Nemo to her. Nemo plays dead to save himself as Nigel arrives, terrifying Darla and throwing the office into chaos. After Nigel is violently thrown out by the dentist, Gill helps Nemo escape into a drain that leads to the ocean.\
Having mistaken Nemo for dead, Marlin thanks Dory and starts his return journey. Dory meets Nemo when he reaches the ocean, but she has lost her memory. Eventually, Dory's memory returns when she reads the word\'a0
\f1\i Sydney
\f0\i0 \'a0on a drainpipe. She reunites Nemo with Marlin, but she is caught in a fishing net with a school of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Grouper"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 grouper}}. Nemo enters the net and orders the grouper to swim downward to break the net and they all escape. Later, having returned home, Marlin and Dory proudly watch Mr. Ray carry Nemo and all his new friends to school.\
Back at the dentist's office, the filter breaks down, and the tank gang escape into Sydney Harbor, unnoticed by the dentist.\
\
During another summer with his Aunt\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Petunia_Dursley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Petunia}}\'a0and Uncle\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Vernon_Dursley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Vernon}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Harry_Potter_(character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Harry Potter}}\'a0is expelled from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hogwarts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hogwarts}}\'a0after using magic to save himself and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dudley_Dursley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dudley Dursley}}\'a0from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dementors"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dementors}}. Harry is whisked off by a group of wizards including\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mad-Eye_Moody"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mad-Eye Moody}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Remus_Lupin"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Remus Lupin}}\'a0and several new faces including\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nymphadora Tonks}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Kingsley Shacklebolt}}\'a0to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Number_12,_Grimmauld_Place"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Number 12, Grimmauld Place}}, the home of his godfather\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sirius_Black"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sirius Black}}. The building also serves as the headquarters of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix_(fictional_organisation)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Order of the Phoenix}}, a secret organisation founded by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Albus Dumbledore}}\'a0which informs Harry that the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ministry of Magic}}\'a0is oblivious to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lord_Voldemort"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lord Voldemort}}'s return. At the Order's headquarters, Sirius mentions that Voldemort is after a special object he did not have during his previous attack.\
Harry's expulsion is reversed at a hearing of the Ministry of Magic and he returns to Hogwarts for his fifth year, where Minister of Magic\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cornelius Fudge}}\'a0has appointed a new\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Defence Against the Dark Arts}}\'a0professor:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dolores Umbridge}}. Umbridge immediately clashes with Harry and punishes him for his "lies" by forcing him to write a message with a magic quill, scarring his hand. Despite the concern of his best friends\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hermione_Granger"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hermione Granger}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ron_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ron Weasley}}, Harry refuses to report Umbridge's punishment to Dumbledore, who has mysteriously distanced himself from Harry since the summer. As Umbridge's control over the school increases, Harry, Hermione and Ron form a secret group to train students in defensive spells, calling themselves "{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dumbledore's Army}}". Umbridge tasks the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Slytherin"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Slytherin}}\'a0students with exposing the group. Meanwhile, Harry and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cho_Chang"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cho Chang}}develop romantic feelings for each other.\
Harry has a vision involving an attack upon\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Arthur_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Arthur Weasley}}, from the point of view of Arthur's attacker. Concerned that Voldemort will exploit this connection to Harry, Dumbledore instructs\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Severus_Snape"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Severus Snape}}\'a0to give Harry\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Occlumency"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Occlumency}}\'a0lessons to defend his mind from Voldemort's influence. These end after Harry discovers through Snape's memories why Snape hated Harry's father James (who often ridiculed him). The connection causes Harry to further isolate himself from his friends. Meanwhile, Sirius' deranged\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eater"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Death Eater}}\'a0cousin\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bellatrix Lestrange}}\'a0escapes from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Azkaban"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Azkaban}}\'a0along with nine other\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eaters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Death Eaters}}. At Hogwarts, Umbridge and her "Inquisitorial Squad" expose Dumbledore's Army by forcing Cho to drink\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Potions_in_Harry_Potter#Veritaserum"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Veritaserum}}. Dumbledore escapes as Fudge orders his arrest. Umbridge becomes the new Headmistress.\
Harry's refusal to forgive Cho causes their relationship to fall apart. After seeing another vision where Sirius is tortured by Voldemort, Harry, Ron and Hermione rush to Umbridge's fireplace to alert the Order via the Floo Network but are caught by her. When Umbridge threatens to use the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magic_in_Harry_Potter#Unforgivable_Curses"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cruciatus Curse}}\'a0on Harry, Hermione tricks her into entering the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hogwarts#Forbidden_Forest"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Forbidden Forest}}\'a0in search of Dumbledore's "secret weapon". Hermione and Harry lead Umbridge to the hiding place of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rubeus Hagrid}}'s giant half-brother\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Grawp"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Grawp}}, only to be confronted by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Centaurs"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 centaurs}}\'a0who kidnap Umbridge after she attacks and insults them.\
Harry, Hermione, Ron,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ginny_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ginny Weasley}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Luna_Lovegood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Luna Lovegood}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Neville_Longbottom"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Neville Longbottom}}\'a0fly to the Ministry of Magic on\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Thestral"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Thestrals}}\'a0in an attempt to save Sirius. The six enter the Department of Mysteries and uncover a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Prophecy_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 bottled prophecy}}, the object Voldemort was after. However, they are ambushed by Death Eaters led by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lucius Malfoy}}\'a0and Bellatrix. Lucius reveals that Harry only saw a dream of Sirius being tortured, which served as a ruse to lure Harry into the Death Eaters' grasp. Harry refuses to give Lucius the prophecy, causing a fight between Dumbledore's Army and the Death Eaters.\
The Death Eaters capture everyone except Harry, threatening to kill them unless he surrenders the prophecy. As Harry obliges, the Order arrive and attack the Death Eaters. This causes Lucius to drop the prophecy, destroying it. Just as Sirius overpowers Lucius, he is killed by Bellatrix. Voldemort appears, but Dumbledore arrives through the Floo Network moments before he can kill Harry. A duel between Voldemort and Dumbledore ensues, which destroys much of the Atrium while Bellatrix escapes. Unable to defeat Dumbledore, Voldemort possesses Harry to tempt Dumbledore into sacrificing him but the love Harry feels for his friends and Sirius makes it impossible for Voldemort to remain in his body.\
Ministry officials arrive before Voldemort\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Apparition_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 disapparates}}; Fudge is forced to admit Voldemort's return and is forced out of his position as Minister in disgrace. Umbridge is removed from Hogwarts and Dumbledore returns as headmaster. Dumbledore explains that he distanced himself from Harry throughout the year hoping it would lessen the risk of Voldemort using their connection. Harry comes to terms with the prophecy: "Neither can live while the other survives."\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lord_Voldemort"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lord Voldemort}}\'a0is tightening his grip on both the wizarding and Muggle worlds, kidnapping\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ollivander"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ollivander}}\'a0from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Diagon_Alley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Diagon Alley}}\'a0and destroying the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Millennium_Bridge_(London)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Millennium Bridge}}. The Malfoy family is disgraced when\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lucius}}\'a0is apprehended and sent to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Azkaban"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Azkaban}}\'a0for his involvement with the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eaters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Death Eaters}}. Voldemort instead chooses\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Draco_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Draco}}\'a0to carry out a secret mission at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hogwarts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hogwarts}}. Draco's mother\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Narcissa_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Narcissa}}\'a0and aunt\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bellatrix Lestrange}}\'a0seek help from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Severus_Snape"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Severus Snape}}, who claims to have been acting as a mole within the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix_(fictional_organisation)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Order of the Phoenix}}\'a0all along. Snape makes an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Unbreakable_Vow"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Unbreakable Vow}}\'a0with Narcissa to protect Draco and fulfill the assignment if he fails.\
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Harry_Potter_(character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Harry Potter}}, now 16 years old, accompanies\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Albus Dumbledore}}\'a0from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Surbiton"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Surbiton}}\'a0to the village of Budleigh Babberton to visit former Potions professor\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Horace_Slughorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Horace Slughorn}}. Slughorn, who has been in hiding, agrees to return to teach at Hogwarts. Dumbledore then takes Harry to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Burrow_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 The Burrow}}, where Harry reunites with his best friends,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ron_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ron Weasley}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hermione_Granger"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hermione Granger}}. The three visit\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fred_and_George"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fred and George Weasley's}}\'a0new joke shop at Diagon Alley and see Draco entering\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Knockturn_Alley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Knockturn Alley}}\'a0with a group of Death Eaters including\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fenrir Greyback}}. Harry believes Voldemort has made Draco a Death Eater, but Ron and Hermione are sceptical. On the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hogwarts_Express"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hogwarts Express}}, Harry hides in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Slytherin"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Slytherin}}\'a0carriage using his\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magical_objects_in_Harry_Potter#Invisibility_Cloak)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Invisibility Cloak}}, but is spotted and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Petrifaction_in_mythology_and_fiction"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 petrified}}\'a0by Malfoy. Harry is found and saved by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Luna_Lovegood"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Luna Lovegood}}.\
At Hogwarts, Harry and Ron borrow textbooks for Slughorn's Potions class, and Harry is stuck with a copy that turns out to be filled with helpful notes and spells left by the "Half-Blood Prince". Harry uses the book to excel in the class and impresses Slughorn, winning a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Potions_in_Harry_Potter#Felix_Felicis"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Liquid Luck potion}}. Ron becomes Keeper of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gryffindor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gryffindor}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Quidditch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Quidditch}}\'a0team and forms a romantic relationship with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lavender_Brown_(Harry_Potter)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lavender Brown}}, upsetting Hermione. Harry consoles Hermione and admits that he now has feelings for Ron's younger sister,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ginny_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ginny Weasley}}.\
Harry spends the Christmas holidays with the Weasleys. On Christmas Eve, Harry discusses his suspicions about Draco to the Order of the Phoenix. His suspicions are dismissed, but\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Arthur_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Arthur Weasley}}\'a0later tells Harry privately that the Malfoys may have been interested in a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magical_Objects_in_Harry_Potter#Vanishing_Cabinet"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Vanishing Cabinet}}. Bellatrix and Greyback attack and burn down the Burrow, drawing Harry into a battle. He saves Ginny before the Order arrive and fight off the Death Eaters. At Hogwarts, Dumbledore reveals to Harry that Slughorn possesses a memory of Voldemort that Dumbledore desperately needs. He asks Harry to confront Slughorn and retrieve the real memory, after being given an altered version that made it appear as though Slughorn did not know anything. Harry is unable to convince Slughorn.\
After Ron accidentally ingests a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Potions_in_Harry_Potter#Amortentia"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 love potion}}\'a0intended for Harry, Harry cures him with Slughorn's help. The trio celebrate with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mead"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 mead}}\'a0that Slughorn had intended to gift to Dumbledore. The mead poisons Ron, and Harry is forced to save his life after Slughorn hesitates. Ron murmurs Hermione's name while recovering in the infirmary, causing Lavender to end their relationship. Harry confronts Draco about the mead and a cursed necklace, and the two duel. Harry uses a curse from the Half-Blood Prince's potion book to severely injure Malfoy, who is rescued and healed by Snape. Fearing the book may be filled with more\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dark_Magic"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dark Magic}}, Ginny and Harry hide it in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Room_of_Requirement"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Room of Requirement}}\'a0and share their first kiss.\
Harry decides to use his Liquid Luck potion to convince Slughorn to give up the memory Dumbledore needs. Harry views the memory with Dumbledore and learns that Voldemort wanted information for creating\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Horcrux"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Horcruxes}}, magical objects that could contain pieces of a wizard's soul and make them immortal. Dumbledore concludes that Voldemort successfully divided his soul into seven pieces by creating six Horcruxes, two of which have already been destroyed:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_diary"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tom Riddle's diary}}\'a0by Harry and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magical_objects_in_Harry_Potter#Marvolo_Gaunt's_Ring"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Marvolo Gaunt's ring}}\'a0by him. The two travel to a seaside cave where Harry aids Dumbledore in drinking a potion that hides another Horcrux,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magical_objects_in_Harry_Potter#Salazar_Slytherin's_Locket"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Slytherin's locket}}.\
A weakened Dumbledore defends them from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Inferius"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Inferi}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Apparate"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 apparates}}\'a0back to Hogwarts.
