Simon tells them that he will give McClane and Carver the school's location if they continue to play his game. While McClane and Carver set off on Simon's next task, the police organize all NYC's public works to search schools, using\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/9-1-1"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 9-1-1}}\'a0to coordinate activities. As McClane and Carver solves Simon's riddles, McClane realizes that Simon is using the school bomb as a distraction to draw the police away from the bomb damage at Wall Street. They return there to find that Simon and his team used fake repair crews to dig into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Federal_Reserve_Bank_of_New_York"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Federal Reserve Bank of New York}}\'a0and steal $140 billion of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Precious_metal#Bullion"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 gold bullion}}\'a0in dump trucks. They follow the trucks to an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aqueduct_(water_supply)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 aqueduct}}\'a0in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_York_City_Water_Tunnel_No._3"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New York City Water Tunnel No. 3}}. McClane then follows the trucks, while Carver continues with Simon's games.\
Within the tunnel McClane kills some of Simon's men, discovering they have a pre-wrapped roll of quarters on them. Simon destroys a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cofferdam"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 cofferdam}}, flooding the tunnel, but McClane escapes through a vent, ending up near Carver. After surviving a car chase with Simon's men who had followed Carver and finding that they also had a pre-wrapped roll of quarters, they realize that the roll of quarters would pay for a toll bridge, and they head to a tanker vessel in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Long_Island_Sound"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Long Island Sound}}. They sneak aboard, learning that the bullion isn't there, but are both captured.\
Simon confirms McClane's suspicions that the school bomb (which had been found using the clues provided by Simon, but turned out to be a dummy) was a trick to distract police before handcuffing the two to the real bomb. He says he is going to destroy the tanker, redistributing the bullion across the Sound, to destroy the economies of the world. Before Simon leaves, McClane jokingly asks him for some aspirin for his hangover, much to Simon's amusement. He happens to have a bottle of aspirin and tosses it to McClane. After Simon leaves, McClane passes a cable splinter to Carver, who picks the handcuffs to free them. They barely escape before the bomb detonates, sinking the tanker.\
As McClane and Carver are debriefed by the police, McClane reports that none of the bullion was on the tanker. McClane notices the bottle of aspirin came from a truckstop located in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Quebec"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Quebec}}\'a0at the Canada-US border. McClane, Carver, and the police arrive at a warehouse near the truckstop where Simon and his men are in the process of distributing the bullion and planning their escape. The rest of Simon's men are captured, while Simon and his girlfriend Katya attempt to escape in a helicopter, stopping to fire upon McClane and Carver. McClane, armed only with a small revolver, shoots an overhead power line that falls onto the helicopter, crashing it and killing Simon and Katya. Carver then convinces McClane to call his estranged wife,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/John_McClane#Family"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Holly}}.\
On July 2, 1996, an enormous\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mothership"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 mothership}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/UFO"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 UFO}}, that has one fourth the mass of the Moon, enters orbit around Earth, deploying assault fortress saucers, each fifteen miles wide, that take positions over some of Earth's major cities. David Levinson, an\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/MIT"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 MIT}}-trained satellite technician, decodes a signal embedded within global satellite transmissions that he determines is the aliens' countdown timer for a coordinated attack. With help from his former wife,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/White_House_Communications_Director"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 White House Communications Director}}\'a0Constance Spano, David, and his father Julius, gain access to the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Oval_Office"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Oval Office}}\'a0and warn\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/President_of_the_United_States"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 President}}\'a0Thomas J. Whitmore the aliens are hostile. Whitmore immediately orders large-scale evacuations of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_York_City"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New York City}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Los_Angeles"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Los Angeles}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Washington,_D.C."}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Washington, D.C.}}, but it is too late; the timer reaches zero and the saucers activate devastating\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Directed-energy_weapons"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 directed-energy weapons}}, killing millions. Whitmore, the Levinsons, and a few others narrowly escape aboard\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Air_Force_One"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Air Force One}}\'a0as the capital is destroyed, along with the other locations over which the saucers are positioned.\
On July 3, international leaders begin ordering individual counterattacks. Their\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Military_aviation"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 air forces}}\'a0attack the saucers positioned above the ruins of the cities, but the saucers are protected by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Force_field_(fiction)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 force fields}}. Each saucer launches a swarm of attack fighters, each with its own shield as well, which wipes out the human fighter squadrons and military bases. Captain Steven Hiller, a F/A-18 jet pilot with the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Marine_Corps"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 USMC}}\'a0squadron\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/VMFA-314"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 VMFA-314}}\'a0based out of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Marine_Corps_Air_Station_El_Toro"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Marine Corps Air Station El Toro}}, survives by luring his attacker to the enclosed spaces of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Grand_Canyon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Grand Canyon}}\'a0and sacrificing his plane, forcing the alien to crash-land. He subdues the injured alien pilot and flags down a convoy of refugees, hitching a ride with former combat pilot Russell Casse. They transport the unconscious alien to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Area_51"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Area 51}}, where Whitmore's group has landed. Through\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Secretary_of_Defense"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Secretary of Defense}}\'a0Albert Nimzicki, they learn that a faction of the government has been involved in a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/UFO_conspiracy_theory"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 UFO conspiracy}}\'a0since 1947, when one of the invaders' attack fighters crashed in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Roswell_UFO_incident"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Roswell}}. Area 51 houses the refurbished alien fighter, and three alien corpses recovered from the crash.\
When eccentric scientist Dr. Brackish Okun examines the alien captured by Steven, it regains consciousness and attacks. It\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Telepathy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 telepathically}}\'a0invades Dr. Okun's mind and uses his vocal cords to communicate with President Whitmore before launching a psychic attack against him. Whitmore sees visions of the aliens' plans: their entire civilization travels from planet to planet, exterminating all indigenous life and stripping the planet of all natural resources. After\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/United_States_Secret_Service"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Secret Service}}\'a0agents and military personnel kill the alien which leaves Dr. Okun in a coma, Whitmore reluctantly authorizes a nuclear attack; a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Northrop_Grumman_B-2_Spirit"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 B-2 Spirit}}\'a0fires a nuclear warhead tipped cruise missile at a saucer positioned above\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Houston"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Houston}}, but the saucer remains intact, whilst wiping out the city.\
On\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Independence_Day_(United_States)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 July 4}}, David demonstrates the key to defeating the aliens is to deactivate their force fields, and devises a plan to do this by uploading a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Computer_virus"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 computer virus}}\'a0into the mothership using the refurbished alien fighter, which Steven volunteers to pilot. With military pilots in short supply, Whitmore enlists the help of volunteers with flight experience, including Russell, to fly the remaining F/A-18s at Area 51; and leads an attack on a saucer bearing down on the base. Flying into space, Steven and David upload the virus and successfully deploy a nuclear weapon on board the mothership, blowing it to pieces. With the aliens' shields deactivated, the fighter jets are able to effectively fight back against the enemy craft, but their supply of missiles is exhausted before they can bring down the ship. As the saucer prepares to fire on the base, Russell has one last missile to spare, but when the firing control on the missile fails, he bravely\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Kamikaze"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 rams}}\'a0his jet into the directed-energy weapon port, causing a chain reaction that destroys the entire ship. Human resistance forces around the world are informed of the alien ships' weak point, and successfully destroy the other saucers. As humankind is rejoicing in victory, Steven and David return to Area 51 unharmed and reunite with their families. They then accompany Whitmore and his daughter in watching the wreckage from the mothership burn up, resembling a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fireworks"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 fireworks}}\'a0display as it enters Earth's atmosphere.\
In 1996, treasure hunter Brock Lovett and his team aboard the research vessel\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Akademik_Mstislav_Keldysh"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Akademik Mstislav Keldysh}}\'a0search the wreck of RMS\'a0
\f1\i Titanic
\f0\i0 \'a0for a necklace with a rare diamond, the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Heart_of_the_Ocean"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Heart of the Ocean}}. They recover a safe containing a drawing of a young woman wearing only the necklace dated April 14, 1912, the day the ship struck the iceberg.
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [Note 1]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \'a0Rose Dawson Calvert, the woman in the drawing, is brought aboard\'a0
\f1\i Keldysh
\f0\i0 \'a0and tells Lovett of her experiences aboard\'a0
\f1\i Titanic
\f0\i0 .\
In 1912\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Southampton"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Southampton}}, 17-year-old first-class passenger Rose DeWitt Bukater, her fianc\'e9 Cal Hockley, and her mother Ruth board the luxurious\'a0
\f1\i Titanic
\f0\i0 . Ruth emphasizes that Rose's marriage will resolve their family's financial problems and retain their high-class persona. Distraught over the engagement, Rose considers suicide by jumping from the stern; Jack Dawson, a penniless artist, intervenes and discourages her. Discovered with Jack, Rose tells a concerned Cal that she was peering over the edge and Jack saved her from falling. When Cal becomes indifferent, she suggests to him that Jack deserves a reward. He invites Jack to dine with them in first class the following night. Jack and Rose develop a tentative friendship, despite Cal and Ruth being wary of him. Following dinner, Rose secretly joins Jack at a party in third class.\
Aware of Cal and Ruth's disapproval, Rose rebuffs Jack's advances, but realizes she prefers him over Cal. After rendezvousing on the bow at sunset, Rose takes Jack to her state room; at her request, Jack sketches Rose posing nude wearing Cal's engagement present, the Heart of the Ocean necklace. They evade Cal's bodyguard, Mr. Lovejoy, and have sex in an automobile inside the cargo hold. On the forward deck, they witness a collision with an iceberg and overhear the officers and designer discussing its seriousness.\
Cal discovers Jack's sketch of Rose and an insulting note from her in his safe along with the necklace. When Jack and Rose attempt to inform Cal of the collision, Lovejoy slips the necklace into Jack's pocket and he and Cal accuse him of theft. Jack is arrested, taken to the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Master-at-arms"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 master-at-arms}}' office, and handcuffed to a pipe. Cal puts the necklace in his own coat pocket.\
With the ship sinking, Rose flees Cal and her mother, who has boarded a lifeboat, and frees Jack. On the boat deck, Cal and Jack encourage her to board a lifeboat; Cal claims he can get himself and Jack off safely. After Rose boards one, Cal tells Jack the arrangement is only for himself. As her boat lowers, Rose decides that she cannot leave Jack and jumps back on board. Cal takes his bodyguard's pistol and chases Rose and Jack into the flooding first-class dining saloon. After using up his ammunition, Cal realizes he gave his coat and consequently the necklace to Rose. He later boards a collapsible lifeboat by carrying a lost child.\
After braving several obstacles, Jack and Rose return to the boat deck. The lifeboats have departed and passengers are falling to their deaths as the stern rises out of the water. The ship breaks in half, lifting the stern into the air. Jack and Rose ride it into the ocean and he helps her onto a wooden panel buoyant enough for only one person. He assures her that she will die an old woman, warm in her bed. Jack dies of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hypothermia"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hypothermia}}
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [8]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \'a0but Rose is saved.\
With Rose hiding from Cal en route, the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/RMS_Carpathia"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 RMS\'a0
\f1\i Carpathia}}\'a0takes the survivors to New York City where Rose gives her name as Rose Dawson. Rose says she later read that Cal committed suicide after losing all his money in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Wall_Street_Crash_of_1929"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Wall Street Crash of 1929}}.\
Back in the present, Lovett decides to abandon his search after hearing Rose's story. Alone on the stern of\'a0
\f1\i Keldysh
\f0\i0 , Rose takes out the Heart of the Ocean\'a0\'96 in her possession all along\'a0\'96 and drops it into the sea over the wreck site. While she is seemingly asleep or has died in her bed,
\fs20 \cf3 \super \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 [9]
\fs24 \cf2 \nosupersub \ulnone \strokec2 \'a0photos on her dresser depict a life of freedom and adventure inspired by the life she wanted to live with Jack. A young Rose reunites with Jack at the\'a0
\f1\i Titanic
\f0\i0 's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Grand_Staircase_of_the_RMS_Titanic"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Grand Staircase}}, applauded by those who died on the ship.\
A large\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Meteor_shower"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 meteor shower}}\'a0obliterates the orbiting\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Space_Shuttle_Atlantis"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Space Shuttle\'a0
\f1\i Atlantis}}\'a0and bombards an area of land around the North Atlantic, devastating\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/New_York_City"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 New York City}}.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/NASA"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 NASA}}\'a0discovers through the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hubble_Space_Telescope"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hubble}}\'a0that the meteors were propelled from the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Asteroid_belt"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 asteroid belt}}\'a0by a rogue asteroid roughly the size of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Texas"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Texas}}, set to collide with Earth in 18 days and cause a second\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Extinction_event"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 extinction event}}. NASA scientists, led by Dan Truman, plan to trigger a thermonuclear detonation at least 800\'a0ft (244 m) inside the asteroid to split it in two, driving the pieces apart so both will fly past the Earth. NASA contacts Harry Stamper, considered the best deep-sea oil driller in the world, for assistance. Harry insists he will need his full team, consisting of A.J. Frost, Rockhound, Max Lennert, Charles "Chick" Chapel, Bear, Freddie Noonan and Oscar Choi, to help execute NASA's plan, and they agree to help.\
NASA plans to launch two specialized\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Space_Shuttle_orbiter"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Space Shuttle orbiters}}, the X-71s,\'a0
\f1\i Freedom
\f0\i0 \'a0and\'a0
\f1\i Independence
\f0\i0 , to increase the chances of success; the shuttles will refill with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Liquid_oxygen"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 liquid oxygen}}\'a0from the Russian space station\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mir"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mir}}\'a0before making a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gravity_assist"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 slingshot maneuver}}\'a0around the Moon to approach the asteroid from behind. NASA puts Harry and his crew through a shortened and rigorous astronaut training program, while Harry's team re-outfit the mobile drillers, "Armadillos", for the job. During training, Truman and Harry are skeptical about the abilities of A.J., who has been dating Harry's daughter Grace against Harry's wishes.\
When a meteorite destroys\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shanghai"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shanghai}}, the government is forced to reveal the asteroid's existence and their plan. The shuttles are launched and arrive at the space station, where its sole cosmonaut Lev Andropov helps with refueling. A major fire breaks out during the fueling process, forcing the crews, including Lev, to evacuate in the shuttles before the station explodes. The shuttles perform the slingshot around the Moon, but approaching the asteroid,\'a0
\f1\i Independence
\f0\i0 's engines are destroyed by trailing debris, and it crash-lands on the asteroid, killing Noonan, Oscar, munitions specialist Lieutenant Halsey, and shuttle pilots colonel Davis and Tucker. Grace, aware A.J. was aboard\'a0
\f1\i Independence
\f0\i0 , is traumatized by this news, believing he was killed. Unknown to the others, A.J., Lev and Bear survive the impact and head towards\'a0
\f1\i Freedom
\f0\i0 's landing site in their Armadillo.\
\pard\pardeftab720\sl280\sa240\partightenfactor0

\f1\i \cf2 Freedom
\f0\i0 \'a0manages to land on the asteroid, but overshoots their target zone, landing on a much harder metallic field. With their drilling falling behind NASA's calculated schedule, the military initiates "secondary protocol", a backup plan to remotely detonate the bomb at the asteroid's surface, despite Truman and Harry's insistence that it would be ineffective. Truman delays the military, while Harry persuades the shuttle commander, Colonel Willie Sharp, to disarm the remote trigger. The crew continues to work, but in their haste, they accidentally hit a gas pocket, blowing their Armadillo into space with Lennert inside. As the world learns of the mission's apparent failure, another meteorite decimates\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Paris"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Paris}}.\
All seems lost until\'a0
\f1\i Independence
\f0\i0 's Armadillo arrives. With A.J. at the controls, they reach the required depth for the bomb. However, flying debris from the asteroid kills lieutenant Gruber and damages the bomb timer, requiring someone to stay behind to manually detonate it. The crew\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Drawing_straws"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 draw straws}}\'a0and A.J. is selected. As he and Harry exit the airlock, Harry rips off A.J.'s air hose and shoves him back inside, telling him he is the son Harry never had and gives his blessing to marry Grace. Harry contacts Grace to bid her farewell. After some last minute difficulties involving both the shuttle engines and the detonator,\'a0
\f1\i Freedom
\f0\i0 \'a0moves to a safe distance and Harry successfully triggers the detonator while his life flashes before his eyes. The bomb successfully splits the asteroid, avoiding the collision with Earth.\'a0
\f1\i Freedom
\f0\i0 \'a0safely returns to Earth, and the surviving crew is treated as heroes. A.J. and Grace get married, with photos of Harry and the other lost crew members present.\
The Trade Federation upsets order in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Galactic_Republic"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Galactic Republic}}\'a0by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Blockade"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 blockading}}\'a0the planet\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Naboo"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Naboo}}\'a0in preparation for a full-scale\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Invasion"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 invasion}}. The Republic's leader,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Supreme_Chancellor_Valorum"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Supreme Chancellor Valorum}}, dispatches\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Jedi"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Jedi Master}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Qui-Gon_Jinn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Qui-Gon Jinn}}\'a0and his apprentice,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Obi-Wan Kenobi}}, to negotiate with Trade Federation Viceroy\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nute_Gunray"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nute Gunray}}.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Palpatine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Darth Sidious}}, a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sith"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sith Lord}}\'a0and the Trade Federation's secret benefactor, orders the Viceroy to kill the Jedi and begin their invasion with an army of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Battle_droid"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 battle droids}}. The Jedi escape and flee to Naboo. During the invasion,\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0saves the life of a clumsy\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gungan"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gungan}}\'a0outcast,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Jar_Jar_Binks"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Jar Jar Binks}}, from being run over by a droid transport. Indebted to\'a0Qui-Gon,\'a0Jar Jar\'a0leads the Jedi to Otoh Gunga, an underwater city of Naboo. The Jedi try to persuade the Gungan leader,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Boss_Nass"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Boss Nass}}, to help the planet's surface dwellers, but are unsuccessful. However, the Jedi manage to obtain\'a0Jar Jar's\'a0guidance and underwater transport to Theed, the capital city of Naboo; they narrowly avoid getting eaten by sea monsters on the way. They rescue Naboo's queen,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Padm%C3%A9_Amidala"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Padm\'e9 Amidala}}, and escape from the blockaded planet on her Royal Starship, intending to reach the Republic capital planet of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Coruscant"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Coruscant}}.\
Amidala's ship is damaged as they pass the Federation blockade and the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hyperdrive"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 hyperdrive}}\'a0is caught in the crossfire, rendering it useless. They land for repairs on the desert planet of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Tatooine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Tatooine}}.\'a0Qui-Gon,\'a0Jar Jar,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Astromech_droid"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 astromech droid}}{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/R2-D2"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 R2-D2}},\'a0and Padm\'e9\'97disguised as one of her handmaidens\'97visit a settlement of Mos Espa to purchase spare parts at a junk shop. They meet the shop's owner,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Watto"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Watto}}, and his nine-year-old slave,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Darth_Vader"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Anakin Skywalker}}, a gifted pilot and engineer who has built a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Protocol_droid"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 protocol droid}}\'a0called\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/C-3PO"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 C-3PO}}.\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0senses a strong presence of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Force"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 the Force}}\'a0within Anakin, and is convinced that he is the prophesied "{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Messiah"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Chosen One}}". Unable to buy the required hyperdrive parts due to the Republic's currency being worthless on Tatooine,\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0wagers both the parts and Anakin's freedom with Watto in a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Podrace"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 podrace}}. Anakin wins, and joins the group to be trained as a Jedi, leaving behind his mother,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shmi_Skywalker"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shmi}}. En route to their starship,\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0encounters\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Darth_Maul"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Darth Maul}}, Darth Sidious' apprentice, who intends to capture Amidala. A duel ensues, but\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0quickly disengages and escapes onboard the starship.\
Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan escort Amidala to Coruscant so that she can plead her people's case to Chancellor Valorum and the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Galactic_Senate"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Galactic Senate}}.\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0asks the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Jedi_Council"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Jedi Council}}\'a0for permission to train Anakin as a Jedi, but the Council refuses, concerned that Anakin is vulnerable to the dark side of the Force. Undaunted,\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0vows to take up Anakin as his new disciple. Meanwhile, Naboo's senator\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Palpatine"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Palpatine}}\'a0persuades Amidala to call for a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Vote_of_no_confidence"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 vote of no confidence}}\'a0in Chancellor Valorum to elect a more capable leader to resolve the crisis. Though she is successful in pushing for the vote, Amidala grows frustrated with the corruption in the Senate and decides to return to Naboo.\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0and\'a0Obi-Wan\'a0are ordered by the Jedi Council to accompany the queen, and investigate the return of the Sith, whom they had believed to be extinct.\
On Naboo, Padm\'e9 reveals herself to the Gungans as Queen Amidala and persuades them to join in an alliance against the Trade Federation. Despite being inept at combat,\'a0Jar Jar\'a0joins his people in a battle against the droid army, while Padm\'e9 leads the search for Viceroy Gunray in Theed. During a battle in the starship hangar,\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0tells Anakin to wait in the cockpit of a vacant starfighter. Anakin inadvertently triggers its\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Autopilot"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 autopilot}}, joining the battle against the Federation droid control ship in space. Anakin blunders into the hangar of the droid control ship and causes its destruction from within before escaping, deactivating the droid army in the process. Meanwhile,\'a0Qui-Gon\'a0and\'a0Obi-Wan\'a0battle Darth Maul, who mortally wounds\'a0Qui-Gon, but is then bisected by\'a0Obi-Wan.\
As he lays dying, Qui-Gon requests that\'a0Obi-Wan\'a0train Anakin. Palpatine is elected as the new supreme chancellor, and Gunray is arrested.\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Yoda"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Yoda}}\'a0promotes\'a0Obi-Wan\'a0to the rank of Jedi Knight and reluctantly accepts Anakin as\'a0Obi-Wan's\'a0apprentice. Padm\'e9 presents a gift of thanks to the Gungans during a celebratory parade.\
Bio-chemical expert Dr. Vladimir Nekhorvich sends a message to the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Impossible_Missions_Force"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 IMF}}\'a0for\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ethan_Hunt"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ethan Hunt}}, an old friend of his, warning that his employer, Biocyte Pharmaceuticals, forced him to develop a biological epidemic to profit from its remedy. He arranges to meet with Ethan to deliver the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chimera_(virus)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Chimera}}\'a0virus, and its cure,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bellerophon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bellerophon}}. With Ethan on vacation and incommunicado, the IMF sends agent Sean Ambrose disguised as Ethan to meet Nekhorvich on a passenger plane. Ambrose goes rogue, killing Nekhorvich and stealing Bellerophon before his men destroy the plane.\
IMF Commander Swanbeck informs Ethan of the circumstances of Nekhorvich's death and they determine Ambrose is responsible. Swanbeck tasks Ethan with recovering the virus and its cure, and has him recruit Nyah Nordoff-Hall, a professional thief presently operating in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Seville"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Seville}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Spain"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Spain}}. After recruiting Nyah and romancing her, Ethan finds out that she is Ambrose's ex-girlfriend and he reluctantly convinces her to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Spy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 spy}}\'a0on Ambrose.\
Ethan assembles his team, computer expert Luther Stickell and pilot Billy Baird, in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sydney"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sydney}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Australia"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Australia}}, where Biocyte laboratories are located and Ambrose is staying. As Ethan stakes out Biocyte, Nyah rekindles her former relationship with Ambrose and relays information to Ethan's team. At a horse racing event, Ambrose meets with Biocyte's CEO, John C. McCloy. He shows McCloy a memory card video of Chimera affecting one of Nekhorvich's colleagues before blackmailing McCloy into cooperating with him. Nyah steals the camera's memory card and delivers it to Ethan. They learn that Chimera has a 20-hour dormant period before it causes death by mass destruction of the victim's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Red_blood_cell"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 red blood cells}}. Bellerophon can only save the victim if used within that 20-hour window. When Nyah discreetly returns the memory card to Ambrose, he notices it is in the wrong pocket of his jacket.\
Ethan's team kidnaps McCloy to force him to give up Bellerophon. However, the only Bellerophon samples were taken by Nekhorvich, and are now in Ambrose's hands. Ambrose has the cure, but does not have the virus; unbeknownst to him at the time, Nekhorvich injected himself with Chimera to smuggle it out of Biocyte. Ambrose plans to exchange a sample of Bellerophon to McCloy for a sample of Chimera. Ethan's team breaks into Biocyte to destroy the virus before the exchange can take place. Ambrose, posing as Ethan, tricks Nyah into revealing the plan, then captures Nyah and raids Biocyte to secure the virus. Ethan is able to destroy all but one sample of Chimera before Ambrose intervenes, and a firefight ensues, culminating in the sample being dropped on the floor between Ambrose and Ethan. Ambrose orders Nyah to retrieve the sample; she instead injects herself with it, preventing Ambrose from simply killing her after she retrieved it for him. Nyah insists that Ethan kill her to destroy the virus but Ethan is unwilling to do so. Ambrose takes Nyah away as Ethan escapes from the laboratory.\
Ambrose releases Nyah to wander the streets of Sydney in a daze, intending to start a pandemic. He offers to sell Bellerophon to McCloy in exchange for stock options, to make him Biocyte's majority shareholder. He predicts that the price of Biocyte's stock will skyrocket due to demand for Bellerophon after the Chimera outbreak. Ethan infiltrates the meeting and steals the remaining samples of Bellerophon. While Ethan is pursued by Ambrose and his men, Luther and Billy locate Nyah, who has wandered to a cliff side, intent on killing herself to prevent the eventual outbreak. Ethan kills Ambrose's men but Ambrose chases him to a beach where Ethan defeats him in a brutal fistfight. With little time left on the 20-hour countdown, Luther reaches Ethan at the beach. As Ethan is about to give Luther the Bellerophon canister, Ambrose recovers and points a gun at Ethan. Ethan throws the canister to Luther and jumps away from Ambrose's shot while kicking up a gun from the sand which he uses to finally kill Ambrose. Luther injects Nyah with the Bellerophon in time to cure her.\
IMF clears Nyah's criminal record and Ethan starts his vacation with her in Sydney.\
In late 1981,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Albus Dumbledore}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Minerva McGonagall}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rubeus Hagrid}}, professors of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry}}, deliver a recently orphaned infant named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Harry_Potter_(character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Harry Potter}}\'a0to his only remaining relatives,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Dursleys"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 the Dursleys}}. Ten years later, Harry has been battling a disjointed life with the Dursleys. After inadvertently causing an accident during a family trip to the zoo, Harry begins receiving unsolicited letters by owls. After the Dursleys escape to an island to avoid more letters, Hagrid re-appears and informs Harry that he is actually a wizard and has been accepted into Hogwarts against the Dursleys' wishes. After taking Harry to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Diagon_Alley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Diagon Alley}}\'a0to buy his supplies for Hogwarts and a pet owl named Hedwig as a birthday present, Hagrid informs him of his past; Harry's parents\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix_(fictional_organisation)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 James and Lily Potter}}\'a0met their demise via a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magic_in_Harry_Potter#Unforgivable_Curses"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Killing Curse}}\'a0at the hands of the malevolent and all-powerful wizard,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lord_Voldemort"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lord Voldemort}}. Harry, the only survivor in the chaos, thus becomes well-known in the wizarding world as "The Boy Who Lived".\
Harry is then taken to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/London_King%27s_Cross_railway_station"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 King's Cross station}}\'a0to board a train to Hogwarts, where he meets three other students:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ron_Weasley"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ron Weasley}}, whom he quickly befriends;\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hermione_Granger"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hermione Granger}}, an intelligent witch born to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Muggle"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 muggle}}\'a0parents; and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Draco_Malfoy"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Draco Malfoy}}, a child from a wealthy wizarding family whom he immediately clashes with. After arriving at school the students assemble in the Great Hall, where all the first-years are sorted by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magical_objects_in_Harry_Potter#Sorting_Hat"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sorting Hat}}\'a0between four houses:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gryffindor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gryffindor}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hufflepuff"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hufflepuff}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ravenclaw"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ravenclaw}}, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Slytherin"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Slytherin}}. Although the Sorting Hat considers putting Harry in Slytherin, he is placed into Gryffindor alongside Ron and Hermione.\
At Hogwarts, Harry begins learning magic spells and discovers more about his past and parents. After recovering the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Magical_objects_in_Harry_Potter#Remembrall"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Remembrall}}\'a0of Gryffindor student\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Neville_Longbottom"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Neville Longbottom}}, Harry is recruited for Gryffindor's\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Quidditch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Quidditch}}team as a Seeker, an extremely rare feat for first-year students. While exploring the school one night, Harry, Ron, and Hermione discover a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cerberus"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 giant three-headed dog}}\'a0named Fluffy in a restricted area of the school. Ron then insults Hermione after being embarrassed by her in a charms lesson, causing Hermione to lock herself in the girls' bathroom. She is attacked by a marauding troll but Harry and Ron save her, befriending her in the process.\
The children later find out Fluffy is guarding the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Philosopher's Stone}}, an object that can grant its owner immortality. Harry suspects that potions teacher and head of Slytherin House\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Severus_Snape"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Severus Snape}}\'a0is trying to obtain the stone in order to return Voldemort to physical form. Hagrid accidentally reveals to the trio that Fluffy will fall asleep if played music. Harry, Ron, and Hermione decide that night to try and find the stone before Snape. They discover an already asleep Fluffy and face a series of safeguards including a deadly plant known as Devil's Snare, a room filled with aggressive flying keys that bruise Harry, and a dangerous life-sized game of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Chess"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 chess}}\'a0that almost kills Ron.\
After getting past the tasks, Harry discovers that it was\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Defence Against the Dark Arts}}\'a0teacher\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Quirinus Quirrell}}\'a0who was trying to claim the stone, and that Snape was actually protecting Harry all along. Quirrell removes his turban and reveals a weak Voldemort living on the back of his head. Through an enchantment placed by Dumbledore, Harry finds the stone in his possession. Voldemort attempts to bargain the stone from Harry in exchange for reviving his parents, but Harry refuses, causing Quirrell to attack. Harry kills Quirrell by burning his skin and reducing him to dust, after which Voldemort's spirit rises from Quirrell's ashes and knocks Harry unconscious.\
Harry recovers in the school hospital with Dumbledore at his side. Dumbledore explains that the stone has been destroyed and that Ron and Hermione are safe. Dumbledore also reveals how Harry was able to defeat Quirrell: when Harry's mother died to save him, her death gave Harry a love-based protection against Voldemort. Harry, Ron, and Hermione are rewarded with house points for their heroic performances, tying them for first place with Slytherin. Dumbledore then awards ten points to Neville for attempting to stop the trio, granting Gryffindor the House Cup. Harry returns home for the summer, happy to finally have a real home in Hogwarts.\
Awakening from a dream of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gandalf"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gandalf}}\'a0the Grey battling the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Balrog"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Balrog}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Frodo_Baggins"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Frodo Baggins}}\'a0and his friend\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Samwise_Gamgee"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Samwise Gamgee}}\'a0find themselves lost in the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Emyn_Muil"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Emyn Muil}}\'a0near\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mordor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mordor}}\'a0and soon become aware that they are being stalked by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gollum"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gollum}}, the former owner of the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/One_Ring"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 One Ring}}. After capturing him, a sympathetic Frodo decides to use Gollum as a guide to Mordor, despite Sam's objections.\
Meanwhile,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aragorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Aragorn}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Legolas"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Legolas}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gimli_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gimli}}\'a0pursue the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Uruk-hai"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Uruk-hai}}\'a0to save their companions\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Meriadoc_Brandybuck"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Merry}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Peregrin_Took"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Pippin}}. The Uruk-hai are ambushed by the Rohirrim, the exiled army of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rohan_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rohan}}, while the two\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hobbit"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hobbits}}\'a0escape into\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fangorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fangorn}}Forest and encounter the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Ent"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ent}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Treebeard"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Treebeard}}. Aragorn's group later meets the Rohirrim and their leader\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/%C3%89omer"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 \'c9omer}}, who reveals that their king\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Th%C3%A9oden"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Th\'e9oden}}\'a0is being manipulated by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Saruman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Saruman}}'s servant\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gr%C3%ADma_Wormtongue"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gr\'edma Wormtongue}}\'a0into turning a blind eye to Saruman's forces running rampant in Rohan. While tracking down the Hobbits in Fangorn, Aragorn's group encounters\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gandalf"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gandalf}}, who, after succumbing to his injuries while killing the Balrog in\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Moria_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Moria}}, has been resurrected as Gandalf the White to help save\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Middle-earth"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Middle-earth}}.\
Aragorn's group travels to Rohan's capital city Edoras, where Gandalf releases Th\'e9oden from Saruman's influence and Wormtongue is banished. After learning about Saruman's plans to wipe out Rohan with his Uruk-hai army, Th\'e9oden decides to move his citizens to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Helm%27s_Deep"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Helm's Deep}}, an ancient fortress that has provided refuge to Rohan's people in times past, while Gandalf departs to acquire the aid of the Rohirrim. Aragorn builds a friendship with Th\'e9oden's niece,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/%C3%89owyn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 \'c9owyn}}, who quickly becomes infatuated with him. When the exodus comes under attack by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Warg_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Warg}}-riding Orcs, Aragorn falls off a cliff into a river and is presumed dead. However, he is found by his horse\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/List_of_Middle-earth_animals#Brego"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Brego}}\'a0and taken to Helm's Deep. The Uruk-hai army arrives at Helm's Deep that night, finding a makeshift army of civilians and Elves from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lothl%C3%B3rien"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lothl\'f3rien}}\'a0waiting for them as a night-long battle follows. Using gunpowder-like explosives on a sewer drain that Wormtongue told Saruman about, the Uruk-hai breach the outer wall and force the remaining defenders to retreat into the inner castle.\
At Fangorn, Merry and Pippin, having met Gandalf in the forest and convincing Treebeard they were allies, are brought to an Ent Council where the Ents decide not to assist in the war. Pippin then tells Treebeard to take them to a route passing\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Isengard"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Isengard}}, where they witness the devastation caused to the forest by Saruman's war efforts. An enraged Treebeard summons the Ents and they storm Isengard, drowning the orcs by breaking their river dam and stranding Saruman in Orthanc.\
At Helm's Deep, Aragorn convinces a despairing Theoden to ride out and meet the Uruks in one last charge. Gandalf and the Rohirrim then arrive at sunrise, turning the tide of the battle and decimating the Uruk-hai while those remaining flee and are slaughtered. Despite this victory, Gandalf warns that Sauron's retaliation will be terrible and swift.\
Meanwhile, becoming loyal to Frodo after taking him and Sam through the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dead_Marshes"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dead Marshes}}, Gollum convinces the Hobbits of another entrance besides the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minor_places_in_Middle-earth"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Black Gate}}. Frodo and Sam are later captured by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rangers_of_Ithilien"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rangers of Ithilien}}\'a0led by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Faramir"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Faramir}}, brother of the late\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Boromir"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Boromir}}. After torturing Gollum while inadvertently instilling in him the notion that he has been betrayed when Frodo saves him from being killed, Faramir learns of the One Ring and takes his captives with him to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gondor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gondor}}\'a0to win his father's respect. While passing through the besieged Gondorian city of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minor_places_in_Middle-earth"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Osgiliath}}, Sam reveals that Boromir's death was because he was driven mad by and tried to take the Ring. An attacking\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Nazg%C3%BBl"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Nazg\'fbl}}\'a0nearly captures Frodo, who momentarily attacks Sam before coming to his senses, forcing Sam to remind him that they are fighting for the good still left in Middle-earth. Faramir is impressed by Frodo's rekindled hope and releases them along with Gollum. While leading the hobbits once more, Gollum decides to take revenge on Frodo and reclaim the ring by leading the group to "{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shelob"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Her}}" upon arriving at\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minor_places_in_Middle-earth"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cirith Ungol}}.\
Two\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hobbit"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hobbits}}, Sm\'e9agol and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/D%C3%A9agol"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 D\'e9agol}}, are fishing when D\'e9agol discovers the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/One_Ring"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 One Ring}}\'a0in the river. Sm\'e9agol is ensnared by the Ring, and kills his friend for it. He retreats into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Misty_Mountains"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Misty Mountains}}\'a0as the Ring twists his body and mind, until he becomes the creature\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gollum"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gollum}}.\
Centuries later,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gandalf"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gandalf}}\'a0leads\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Aragorn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Aragorn}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Legolas"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Legolas}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gimli_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gimli}}, and King\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Th%C3%A9oden"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Th\'e9oden}}\'a0to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Isengard"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Isengard}}, where they reunite with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Meriadoc_Brandybuck"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Merry}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Peregrin_Took"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Pippin}}. Gandalf retrieves the defeated\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Saruman"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Saruman}}'s\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Palant%C3%ADr"}}{\fldrslt 
\f1\i \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 palant\'edr}}. Pippin later looks into the seeing-stone, and is telepathically attacked by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Sauron"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Sauron}}. Gandalf deduces that Sauron will attack\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gondor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gondor}}'s capital\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minas_Tirith"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Minas Tirith}}. He rides there to warn Gondor's steward\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Denethor"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Denethor}}, taking Pippin with him.\
Gollum leads\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Frodo_Baggins"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Frodo Baggins}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Samwise_Gamgee"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Samwise Gamgee}}\'a0to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Minas_Morgul"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Minas Morgul}}. The hobbits begin climbing a stair carved in the cliff face that will take them into Mordor via a 'secret way' - unaware that Gollum plans to kill them and take the Ring. Sauron's army strikes and overwhelms\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Osgiliath"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Osgiliath}}, forcing\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Faramir"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Faramir}}\'a0and his garrison to retreat to Minas Tirith.\
Gollum disposes of the Hobbits' food, blaming Sam. Frodo tells Sam to go home, before Frodo and Gollum continue to the tunnel leading to Mordor, where Gollum tricks him into venturing into the lair of the giant spider\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shelob"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shelob}}. Frodo narrowly escapes and confronts Gollum, telling him that he must destroy the Ring for both their sakes. Gollum attacks Frodo, but falls down a chasm. Frodo continues on, but Shelob discovers, paralyses and binds him. However, Sam arrives and drives her away. Sam hides as\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Orc"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Orcs}}\'a0appear and take Frodo with them. Sam follows the Orcs into the Tower of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cirith_Ungol"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cirith Ungol}}, and frees Frodo so they can continue their journey.\
Aragorn learns from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Elrond"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Elrond}}\'a0that\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Arwen"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Arwen}}\'a0is dying, having refused to leave Middle Earth after seeing a vision of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Eldarion"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 her son with Aragorn}}. Elrond gives Aragorn\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/And%C3%BAril"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 And\'faril}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Isildur"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Isildur}}'s sword\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Narsil"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Narsil}}\'a0reforged, so he can reclaim his birthright while gaining reinforcements from the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dead_Men_of_Dunharrow"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dead Men of Dunharrow}}. Joined by Legolas and Gimli, Aragorn travels to the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Paths_of_the_Dead"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Paths of the Dead}}, recruiting the Army of the Dead by pledging to release them from the curse Isildur put on them. Faramir is gravely wounded after a futile effort to retake Osgiliath; believing his son to be dead, Denethor falls into madness. Gandalf is left to defend the city against the Orc army, led by\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gothmog_(Third_Age)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Gothmog}}. As Gothmog's army forces its way into the city, Denethor attempts to kill himself and Faramir on a\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Pyre"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 pyre}}. Pippin alerts Gandalf and they save Faramir, but a burning Denethor leaps to his death from the top of Minas Tirith just before Th\'e9oden and his nephew,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/%C3%89omer"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 \'c9omer}}, arrive with the Rohirrim. During the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Battle_of_the_Pelennor_Fields"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 ensuing battle}}, they are overwhelmed by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Oliphaunt"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Oliphaunt}}-riding\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Haradrim"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Haradrim}}, while the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Witch-king_of_Angmar"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Witch-king of Angmar}}\'a0mortally wounds Th\'e9oden. Though Th\'e9oden's niece\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/%C3%89owyn"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 \'c9owyn}}\'a0destroys the Witch-King with Merry's help, Th\'e9oden dies of his wounds. Aragorn arrives with the Army of the Dead, who overcome the Orcs and win the battle; Aragorn then frees them from the curse. Aragorn decides to lead his army upon the Black Gate as a distraction, so Frodo and Sam can get to\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Mount_Doom"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Mount Doom}}.\
Aragorn's army\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Battle_of_the_Morannon"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 draw out Sauron's forces}}\'a0and empties Mordor, allowing Frodo and Sam to reach the volcano, but Gollum attacks them just as they reach Mount Doom. Frodo succumbs to the Ring and claims it as his own. Gollum attacks Frodo and bites his finger off to reclaim the Ring. Frodo fights back and knocks Gollum, who is holding the Ring, into the volcano, destroying the Ring and killing Gollum. As Frodo and Sam escape, Sauron is destroyed and Mordor crumbles. Gandalf flies in with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Eagle_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 eagles}}\'a0to rescue the Hobbits, who awaken later in Minas Tirith and are reunited with the surviving Fellowship members. Aragorn is crowned King of Gondor and takes Arwen as his queen. The Hobbits return home to the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shire_(Middle-earth)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shire}}, where Sam marries\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Rosie_Cotton"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Rosie Cotton}}. A few years later, Frodo departs Middle Earth for the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Undying_Lands"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Undying Lands}}\'a0with his uncle\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bilbo_Baggins"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bilbo}}, Gandalf, and the Elves. He leaves Sam the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Red_Book_of_Westmarch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Red Book of Westmarch}}, which details their adventures. Sam then returns to the Shire, where he embraces Rosie and their children.\
Newlyweds\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Shrek_(character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Shrek}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Princess_Fiona"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fiona}}\'a0return from their honeymoon to find they have been invited by Fiona's parents to a royal ball to celebrate their marriage. Shrek refuses to go at first, but Fiona talks him into it, and along with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Donkey_(Shrek)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Donkey}}, they travel to the kingdom of Far Far Away. They meet Fiona's parents, King Harold and Queen Lillian, who are shocked to see both their daughter and son-in-law are ogres, with Harold particularly repulsed. At dinner, Shrek and Harold get into a heated argument over how Shrek and Fiona will raise their family, and Fiona, disgusted at Shrek and Harold's behavior, locks herself away in her room that evening. Shrek worries that he has lost his true love, particularly after finding her childhood diary and reading that she was once infatuated with Prince Charming.\
Harold is reprimanded by the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fairy_Godmother_(Shrek)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fairy Godmother}}\'a0and her son Prince Charming by reminding him that Charming was to marry Fiona in exchange for his own happy ending. She implores him to find a way of getting rid of Shrek. Harold arranges for Shrek and Donkey to join him on a fictitious hunting trip, which is actually a trap to lure them into the hands of an assassin,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Puss_in_Boots_(Shrek)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Puss in Boots}}. Unable to defeat Shrek, Puss reveals that he was paid by Harold and offers to come along and make amends. The three sneak into the Fairy Godmother's potion factory and steal a "Happily Ever After" potion that Shrek thinks will restore Fiona's love for him.\
Shrek and Donkey both drink the potion and fall into a deep sleep, awakening the next morning to discover its effects: Shrek is now a handsome man while Donkey has turned into an elegant white stallion. In order to make the change permanent, Shrek must kiss Fiona by midnight. Shrek, Donkey and Puss return to the castle to discover that the potion has transformed Fiona back into her former human self as well. However, the Fairy Godmother, having discovered the potion's theft, intercepts Shrek and sends Charming to pose as him and win Fiona's love. At the Fairy Godmother's urging, Shrek leaves the castle, thinking that the best way to make Fiona happy is to let her go.\
To ensure that Fiona falls in love with Charming, the Fairy Godmother gives Harold a love potion to put into Fiona's tea. This exchange is overheard by Shrek, Donkey and Puss, who are arrested by the royal guards and thrown into a dungeon. While the royal ball begins, several of Shrek's friends band together to free the trio with the help of The Muffin Man's monster-sized\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Gingerbread_man"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 gingerbread man}}, which breaks through the castle's defenses. Shrek is too late to prevent Charming from kissing Fiona, but instead of falling in love with Charming, Fiona knocks him out with a headbutt. Harold reveals that he never gave Fiona the love potion, whereupon the now-enraged Fairy Godmother attacks Shrek. In the ensuing melee, Harold sacrifices himself to save Shrek; his armor ricochets a spell cast by the Fairy Godmother which disintegrates her, and Harold is turned back into the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/The_Frog_Prince"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Frog Prince}}, his original form. Harold gives his blessing to the marriage and apologizes for his earlier behavior, admitting his use of the Happily Ever After potion years earlier to gain Lillian's love.\
As the clock strikes midnight, Fiona rejects Shrek's offer to remain humans, and they happily let the potion's effects wear off and revert to their ogre forms, while Donkey changes back to his natural form as well. In the mid-credits scene, Dragon, who had previously romanced Donkey, reveals that they now have several dragon-donkey hybrid babies, much to his surprise.\
\pard\pardeftab720\sl280\sa240\partightenfactor0
{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Harry_Potter_(character)"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Harry}}\'a0awakens from a nightmare wherein a man named\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Frank_Bryce"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Frank Bryce}}\'a0is killed after overhearing\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Lord_Voldemort"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Lord Voldemort}}\'a0conspiring with\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eater#Peter_Pettigrew"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Peter Pettigrew}}\'a0and another man. While Harry attends the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Quidditch"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Quidditch}}\'a0World Cup match between\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Republic_of_Ireland"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Ireland}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Bulgaria"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Bulgaria}}\'a0with the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Weasleys"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Weasleys}}\'a0and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hermione_Granger"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hermione}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Death_Eaters"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Death Eaters}}\'a0terrorise the camp, and the man who appeared in Harry's dream summons the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Dark_Mark"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Dark Mark}}.\
At\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hogwarts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hogwarts}},\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Albus Dumbledore}}\'a0introduces ex-{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Auror"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Auror}}\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Alastor_Moody"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Alastor "Mad-Eye" Moody}}\'a0as the new\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Defence Against the Dark Arts}}\'a0teacher. He also announces that the school will host an event known as the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Triwizard Tournament}}, in which three magical schools compete across three dangerous challenges. The\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Goblet of Fire}}\'a0selects "champions" to take part in the competition:\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Cedric_Diggory"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Cedric Diggory}}\'a0of\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Hufflepuff"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Hufflepuff}}\'a0representing Hogwarts,\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Viktor_Krum"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Viktor Krum}}\'a0representing the\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Durmstrang Institute}}\'a0from Eastern Europe, and\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Fleur_Delacour"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Fleur Delacour}}\'a0representing\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Beauxbatons_Academy_of_Magic"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Beauxbatons Academy of Magic}}\'a0from\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/France"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 France}}. The Goblet then unexpectedly selects Harry as a fourth champion. Dumbledore is unable to pull the underage Harry out of the tournament, as Ministry official\'a0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "applewebdata://7998BC3A-FC84-49B5-A62D-C9951A11A103/wiki/Barty_Crouch_Sr."}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 \strokec3 Barty Crouch Sr.}}\'a0insists that the champions are bound by a contract after being selected.\
For the first task, each champion must retrieve a golden egg guarded by the dragon they pick. Harry succeeds in retrieving the egg, which contains information about the second challenge.
